          1
          
          require 'test_helper'
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
          
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          1
          
          class DbStructuralConstraintsCheckerTest < ActiveSupport::TestCase
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
            
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          1
          
              test 'check_credits_children' do 
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
          
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          1
          
                  e1 = default_ensemble("s1")
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
                  e1.creditsMin = 5
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          1
          
                  e1.creditsMax = 5
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          1
          
                  e1.contenu = "s2 1 true, s3 1-2 true"
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
          
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          1
          
                  e2 = default_ensemble("s2")
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          1
          
                  e2.creditsMin = 5
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          1
          
                  e2.creditsMax = 5
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          1
          
                  e2.contenu = nil
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
          
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          1
          
                  e3 = default_ensemble("s3")
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          1
          
                  e3.creditsMin = 5
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          1
          
                  e3.creditsMax = 5
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
                  e3.contenu = nil
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
          
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          1
          
                  assert e2.save > 0
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
                  assert e3.save > 0
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
          
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1
          
                  scc = DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.new(e1)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
                  assert !scc.check_credits_children()
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1
          
                  assert !scc.report.empty?
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1
          
                  scc.report.erase()
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
                  e1.contenu = "s2 1 false, s3 1-2 false"
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.check_credits_children()
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.report.empty?
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
          
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          1
          
                  e1.contenu = "s2 1 true, s3 1-2 false"
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.check_credits_children()
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.report.empty?
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          1
          
                  e1.contenu = "s2 1 false, s3 1-2 true"
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.check_credits_children()
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.report.empty?
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
          
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          1
          
                  assert e1.save > 0
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
          
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
              end
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
          
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          1
          
              test 'check_credits_parent' do 
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
          
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          1
          
                  e1 = default_ensemble("s1")
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          1
          
                  e1.creditsMin = 10
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          1
          
                  e1.creditsMax = 10
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          1
          
                  e1.contenu = "s2 1 true, s3 1-2 true"
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          1
          
                  e2 = default_ensemble("s2")
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          1
          
                  e2.creditsMin = 5
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          1
          
                  e2.creditsMax = 5
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          1
          
                  e2.contenu = nil
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
          
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          1
          
                  e3 = default_ensemble("s3")
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          1
          
                  e3.creditsMin = 5
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          1
          
                  e3.creditsMax = 5
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          1
          
                  e3.contenu = nil
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
          
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          1
          
                  scc = DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.new(e3)
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
          
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.check_credits_parent() # Si pas dans la DB, parent ok car aucun parent pour le moment
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.report.empty?
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
          
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          1
          
                  assert e2.save > 0
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          1
          
                  assert e3.save > 0
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          1
          
                  assert e1.save > 0
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
          
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.check_credits_parent()
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.report.empty?
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
          
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          1
          
                  e3.creditsMin = 4
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          1
          
                  e3.creditsMax = 4
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          1
          
                  assert !scc.check_credits_parent()
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          1
          
                  assert !scc.report.empty?
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          1
          
                  scc.report.erase
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
          
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          1
          
                  e3.creditsMin = 6
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          1
          
                  e3.creditsMax = 6
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          1
          
                  assert !scc.check_credits_parent()
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          1
          
                  assert !scc.report.empty?
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          1
          
                  scc.report.erase
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
          
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          1
          
                  e3.creditsMin = 5
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          1
          
                  e3.creditsMax = 5
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.check_credits_parent()
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.report.empty?
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
          
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          1
          
                  scc = DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.new(e1)
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.check_credits_parent()
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.report.empty?
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
          
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
              end
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
          
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
          =begin
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
              Cre l'arbre suivant et tente d'y ajouter des cycles
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                                      mod1
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
                                 /           \
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
                          mod2                   mod3
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                       /        \   
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                    mod4        mod5    
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
                              /      \
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                            mod6     mod7
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
          =end

              test 'check_loops' do 
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
          
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          1
          
                  e1 = default_ensemble("s1")
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          1
          
                  e2 = default_ensemble("s2")
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          1
          
                  e3 = default_ensemble("s3")
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          1
          
                  e4 = default_ensemble("s4")
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          1
          
                  e5 = default_ensemble("s5")
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          1
          
                  e6 = default_ensemble("s6")
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          1
          
                  e7 = default_ensemble("s7")
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
          
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          1
          
                  e1.contenu = "s2 1 false, s3 1-2 false"
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          1
          
                  e2.contenu = "s4 1 false, s5 1-2 false"
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          1
          
                  e5.contenu = "s6 1 false, s7 1-2 false"
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
          
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          1
          
                  assert e7.save > 0
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          1
          
                  assert e6.save > 0
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          1
          
                  assert e5.save > 0
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          1
          
                  assert e4.save > 0
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          1
          
                  assert e2.save > 0
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          1
          
                  assert e3.save > 0
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          1
          
                  assert e1.save > 0
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
          
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                  # Test lorsqu'il n'y a aucun cycle
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
          
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          1
          
                  scc = DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.new(e1)
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.check_loops()
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.report.empty?
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
          
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          1
          
                  scc = DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.new(e2)
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.check_loops()
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.report.empty?
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
          
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          1
          
                  scc = DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.new(e3)
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.check_loops()
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.report.empty?
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
          
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          1
          
                  scc = DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.new(e4)
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.check_loops()
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.report.empty?
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
          
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          1
          
                  scc = DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.new(e5)
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.check_loops()
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.report.empty?
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
          
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          1
          
                  scc = DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.new(e6)
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.check_loops()
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.report.empty?
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
          
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          1
          
                  scc = DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.new(e7)
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.check_loops()
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.report.empty?
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
          
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
                  # Test de dtection des cycles 
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
          
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          1
          
                  e4.contenu = "s4 1 false"
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          1
          
                  scc = DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.new(e4)
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          1
          
                  assert !scc.check_loops()
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          1
          
                  assert !scc.report.empty?
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
          
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          1
          
                  e4.contenu = "s1 1 false"
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          1
          
                  scc = DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.new(e4)
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          1
          
                  assert !scc.check_loops()
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          1
          
                  assert !scc.report.empty?
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
          
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          1
          
                  e7.contenu = "s2 1 false"
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          1
          
                  scc = DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.new(e7)
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          1
          
                  assert !scc.check_loops()
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          1
          
                  assert !scc.report.empty?
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
          
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          1
          
                  e8 = default_ensemble("s8")
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          1
          
                  e8.contenu = "s2 1 false"
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          1
          
                  assert e8.save > 0
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
          
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          1
          
                  e6.contenu = "s8 1 false"
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          1
          
                  scc = DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.new(e6)
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          1
          
                  assert !scc.check_loops()
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          1
          
                  assert !scc.report.empty?
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
          
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          1
          
                  e3.contenu = "s5 1 false"
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          1
          
                  scc = DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.new(e3)
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.check_loops()
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.report.empty?
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
          
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
              end
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
          
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
          =begin
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
              
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
                            19                _ = obligatoire
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
                      /      |      \
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
                  10_       5<9       2<4
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
              /  /  \  \    /|\        |
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
             5_ 5    5  5  5 2  4_     3
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
              
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
                               e1             _ = obligatoire
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
                      /         |       \
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
                  e2           e3           e4
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
              /  /  \  \      / | \          |
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
             e5 c6   c7 c8 c9  c10 c11      c12
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
          
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
          =end
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
          
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          1
          
              test 'check_strict_credits' do
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
          
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          1
          
                  hash = build_tree()
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
          
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          1
          
                  assert DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["c12"], 3)
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          1
          
                  assert DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e5"], 5)
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
          
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          1
          
                  assert DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e4"], 3)
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          1
          
                  assert DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e4"], 0)
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          1
          
                  assert !DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e4"], 2)
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          1
          
                  assert !DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e4"], 4)
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          
          
              
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          1
          
                  assert DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e3"], 6)
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          1
          
                  assert DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e3"], 9)
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          1
          
                  assert DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e3"], 4)
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          1
          
                  assert !DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e3"], 5)
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          1
          
                  assert !DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e3"], 2)
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          1
          
                  assert !DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e3"], 7)
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          
          
              
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          1
          
                  assert DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e2"], 5)
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          1
          
                  assert DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e2"], 10)
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          1
          
                  assert DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e2"], 15)
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          1
          
                  assert DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e2"], 20)
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          1
          
                  assert !DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e2"], 0)
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          1
          
                  assert !DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e2"], 6)
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          
          
              
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          1
          
                  assert DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e1"], 10)
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          1
          
                  assert DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e1"], 13)
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          1
          
                  assert DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e1"], 16)
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          1
          
                  assert DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e1"], 19)
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          1
          
                  assert DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e1"], 22)
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          1
          
                  assert !DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e1"], 0)
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          1
          
                  assert !DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e1"], 3)
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          1
          
                  assert !DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e1"], 9)
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          1
          
                  assert !DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e1"], 15)
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          1
          
                  assert !DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e1"], 21)
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          1
          
                  assert !DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["e1"], 23)
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          
          
          
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          
          
              end
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          
          
          
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          1
          
              def build_tree()
        
      253.

      254.

          1
          
                  e1 = default_ensemble("e1")

                  e1.contenu = "e2 1 true, e3 1 false, e4 3 false"

              test "check_strict_credits_on_instance" do

      329.

          1

          1

          1

    444. 
          1
          
              test 'make_children_array' do
        
      445. 
      
        
    445. 
          
          
          
        
      446. 
      
        
    446. 
          1
          
                  e1 = default_ensemble("e1")
        
      447. 
      
        
    447. 
          1
          
                  e2 = default_ensemble("e2")
        
      448. 
      
        
    448. 
          1
          
                  e3 = default_ensemble("e3")
        
      449. 
      
        
    449. 
          
          
          
        
      450. 
      
        
    450. 
          1
          
                  e1.contenu = "e2 1 true, e3 1-2 false"
        
      451. 
      
        
    451. 
          
          
          
        
      452. 
      
        
    452. 
          1
          
                  assert DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.make_children_array(nil) == nil
        
      453. 
      
        
    453. 
          1
          
                  assert DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.make_children_array(e1) == :child_miss_error
        
      454. 
      
        
    454. 
          
          
          
        
      455. 
      
        
    455. 
          1
          
                  assert e2.save > 0
        
      456. 
      
        
    456. 
          1
          
                  assert DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.make_children_array(e1) == :child_miss_error
        
      457. 
      
        
    457. 
          
          
          
        
      458. 
      
        
    458. 
          1
          
                  assert e3.save > 0
        
      459. 
      
        
    459. 
          1
          
                  arr = DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.make_children_array(e1)
        
      460. 
      
        
    460. 
          
          
                  
        
      461. 
      
        
    461. 
          1
          
                  assert arr[0][0].sigles == "e2"
        
      462. 
      
        
    462. 
          1
          
                  assert arr[0][1] == true
        
      463. 
      
        
    463. 
          1
          
                  assert arr[1][0].sigles == "e3"
        
      464. 
      
        
    464. 
          1
          
                  assert arr[1][1] == false
        
      465. 
      
        
    465. 
          
          
          
        
      466. 
      
        
    466. 
          
          
              end
        
      467. 
      
        
    467. 
          
          
          
        
      468. 
      
        
    468. 
          1
          
              test "check_all" do
        
      469. 
      
        
    469. 
          
          
          
        
      470. 
      
        
    470. 
          1
          
                  eo = default_ensemble("s")
        
      471. 
      
        
    471. 
          1
          
                  dscc = DbStructuralConstraintsChecker.new(eo)
        
      472. 
      
        
    472. 
          1
          
                  assert dscc.check_all()
        
      473. 
      
        
    473. 
          1
          
                  assert dscc.check_all_except_parent()
        
      474. 
      
        
    474. 
          1
          
                  assert dscc.report.empty?
        
      475. 
      
        
    475. 
          
          
          
        
      476. 
      
        
    476. 
          
          
              end
        
      477. 
      
        
    477. 
          
          
          
        
      478. 
      
        
    478. 
          
          
          end
        
      479.

    test/unit/constraints/logical_expression_test.rb

    100.0 % covered

    43 relevant lines. 43 lines covered and 0 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          1
          
          require 'test_helper'
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
          
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          1
          
          class LogicalExpressionTest < ActiveSupport::TestCase
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
          
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          1
          
              test "evaluate" do
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
          
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          1
          
                  l = LogicalExpression.new("((a1 & a2) | a42) && (!a4 ^ a1)") # ^ = xor
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
          
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          1
          
                  assert l.evaluate(["a42","a1"]) == false
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
                  assert l.evaluate(["a42","a42"]) == true 
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          1
          
                  assert l.evaluate(["a42","a4"]) == false 
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          1
          
                  assert l.evaluate(["a3","a5","a6","a7"]) == false
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          1
          
                  assert l.evaluate(["a3","a5","a6","a7", "a1","a2","a4"]) == true 
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          1
          
                  assert l.evaluate([]) == false 
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          1
          
                  assert l.evaluate(nil) == false
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          1
          
                  assert l.evaluate([""]) == false 
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
          
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          1
          
                  l = LogicalExpression.new("!a1 & !a2 & !a3")
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          1
          
                  assert l.evaluate("") == true 
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
          
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          1
          
                  l = LogicalExpression.new("")
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
                  assert l.evaluate("") == true 
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
          
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          1
          
                  l = LogicalExpression.new("        ")
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
                  assert l.evaluate("") == true 
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
          
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1
          
                  l = LogicalExpression.new(nil)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
                  assert l.evaluate("") == true 
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
              end
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
              test "well_formed?" do 
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
          
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          1
          
                  assert LogicalExpression.new("a").well_formed?()
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          1
          
                  assert LogicalExpression.new("(((((a)))))").well_formed?()
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          1
          
                  assert LogicalExpression.new("a & b | c ^ d && e || f").well_formed?()
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1
          
                  assert LogicalExpression.new("((a & b) | c) ^ (d) && (e || f)").well_formed?()
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          1
          
                  assert LogicalExpression.new("(() | c) ^ (d) && (e || f)").well_formed?()
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          1
          
                  assert !LogicalExpression.new("").well_formed?()
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          1
          
                  assert !LogicalExpression.new(nil).well_formed?()
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          1
          
                  assert !LogicalExpression.new("(").well_formed?()
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1
          
                  assert !LogicalExpression.new(")").well_formed?()
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          1
          
                  assert !LogicalExpression.new("()").well_formed?()
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          1
          
                  assert !LogicalExpression.new("(  )").well_formed?()
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          1
          
                  assert !LogicalExpression.new("a a").well_formed?()
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          1
          
                  assert !LogicalExpression.new("((a & b | c) ^ (d) && (e || f)").well_formed?()
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          1
          
                  assert !LogicalExpression.new("((a & b) | ) ^ (d) && (e || f)").well_formed?()
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          1
          
                  assert !LogicalExpression.new("((a & b) | c)  (d) && (e || f)").well_formed?()
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          1
          
                  assert !LogicalExpression.new("(((((a))))").well_formed?()
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
          
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
              end
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
          
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          1
          
              test "extract_variables" do 
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
          
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          1
          
                  assert LogicalExpression.new("").extract_variables().empty?
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          1
          
                  assert LogicalExpression.new(nil).extract_variables().empty?
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          1
          
                  assert LogicalExpression.new("a").extract_variables() == ["a"]
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          1
          
                  assert LogicalExpression.new("a & b").extract_variables().sort == ["a", "b"]
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          1
          
                  assert LogicalExpression.new("(((a & b || ! c ^ d)) & b)").extract_variables().sort == ["a", "b","c","d"]
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
              
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
              end
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
          
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
          end
        
      65.

              test 'check_credits' do

    7.

      8.

      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          1
          
                  eo = default_ensemble("eo1")
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1

      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          1

      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
          
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          1

      14.

          1

      16.

          1

      17.

          1

      19.

              test 'check_mandatory_content' do
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
          
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          1
          
                  eo = default_ensemble("eo1")
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          1
          
                  co1 = default_cours("co1")
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          1
          
                  co2 = default_cours("co2")
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
          
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          1
          
                  eo.creditsMin = 5
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          1
          
                  eo.creditsMax = 5
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
          
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          1
          
                  co1.creditsMin = 5
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          1
          
                  co1.creditsMax = 5
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
          
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          1
          
                  co2.creditsMin = 5
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          1
          
                  co2.creditsMax = 5
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
          
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          1
          
                  eo.contenu = "co1 1 true, co2 1 false"
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
          
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          1
          
                  n1 = SelectionNode.new(eo)
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          1

      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          1

      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
          
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          1
          
                  n1.add_child(n2)
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          1
          
                  n1.add_child(n3)
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
          
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          1
          
                  scc = SelectionConstraintsChecker.new(n1)
        
      156.

          1

      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          1
          
              test 'check_and_apply_choice_constraints' do
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
                  
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          1
          
                  e1 = default_ensemble("s1")
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          1
          
                  e1.creditsMin = 5
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          1
          
                  e1.creditsMax = 5
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          1
          
                  e1.contenu = "s2 1 false, s3 1-2 false"
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
          
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          1
          
                  c1 = default_cours("s2")
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          1
          
                  c1.creditsMin = 5
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          1
          
                  c1.creditsMax = 5
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
          
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          1
          
                  c2 = default_cours("s3")
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          1
          
                  c2.creditsMin = 5
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          1
          
                  c2.creditsMax = 5
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
          
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          1
          
                  assert c2.save() > 0
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          1
          
                  assert c1.save() > 0
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          1
          
                  assert e1.save() > 0
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
          
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          1
          
                  n1 = SelectionNode.new(e1)
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          1
          
                  n2 = SelectionNode.new(c1)
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          1
          
                  n3 = SelectionNode.new(c2)
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
          
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          1
          
                  n1.add_child(n2)
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          1
          
                  n1.add_child(n3)
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
          
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
                  # Simple vrification que la slection de s1 enclenche la contrainte et donc remplis le rapport
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          
          
          
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          1
          
                  co = create_constraints_object("*", "s1", "E(s2)")
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          1
          
                  assert co.save > 0
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
          
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          1
          
                  scc = SelectionConstraintsChecker.new(n1, n1)
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.report.list.size == 0
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          1
          
                  scc.check_and_apply_choice_constraints
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.report.list.size == 0
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          1
          
                  n1.select
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          1
          
                  scc.check_and_apply_choice_constraints
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.report.list.size > 0
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          1
          
                  n1.deselect
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          1
          
                  assert co.destroy
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          
          
          
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          1
          
                  co = create_constraints_object("*", "s1", "T(s2)")
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          1
          
                  assert co.save > 0
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          
          
          
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          1
          
                  scc = SelectionConstraintsChecker.new(n1, n1)
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.report.list.size == 0
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          1
          
                  scc.check_and_apply_choice_constraints

                  assert co.destroy

      267.

          1
          
                  n1.deselect

          1
          
                  assert co.destroy
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          
          
          
        
      270. 
      
        
    270. 
          
          
                  # Cas de M[ s1 > s2 ]
        
      271. 
      
        
    271. 
          
          
          
        
      272. 
      
        
    272. 
          
          
          =begin
        
      273. 
      
        
    273. 
          
          
                      s4                  s4
        
      274. 
      
        
    274. 
          
          
                      |        =>         |
        
      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          
          
                      s1       =>         s5
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          
          
                  /       \    =>     /       \
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          
          
                s2        s3        s6         s7
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          
          
          
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          
          
          =end
        
      280. 
      
        
    280. 
          
          
          
        
      281. 
      
        
    281. 
          1
          
                  e2 = default_ensemble("s4")
        
      282. 
      
        
    282. 
          1
          
                  e2.creditsMin = 5
        
      283. 
      
        
    283. 
          1
          
                  e2.creditsMax = 5
        
      284. 
      
        
    284. 
          1
          
                  e2.contenu = "s1 1 true"
        
      285. 
      
        
    285. 
          
          
                  
        
      286. 
      
        
    286. 
          1
          
                  e3 = default_ensemble("s5")
        
      287. 
      
        
    287. 
          1
          
                  e3.creditsMin = 5
        
      288. 
      
        
    288. 
          1
          
                  e3.creditsMax = 5
        
      289. 
      
        
    289. 
          1
          
                  e3.contenu = "s6 1 false, s7 1-2 false"
        
      290. 
      
        
    290. 
          
          
          
        
      291. 
      
        
    291. 
          1
          
                  c3 = default_cours("s6")
        
      292. 
      
        
    292. 
          1
          
                  c3.creditsMin = 5
        
      293. 
      
        
    293. 
          1
          
                  c3.creditsMax = 5
        
      294. 
      
        
    294. 
          
          
          
        
      295. 
      
        
    295. 
          1
          
                  c4 = default_cours("s7")
        
      296. 
      
        
    296. 
          1
          
                  c4.creditsMin = 5
        
      297. 
      
        
    297. 
          1
          
                  c4.creditsMax = 5
        
      298. 
      
        
    298. 
          
          
          
        
      299. 
      
        
    299. 
          1
          
                  assert c4.save() > 0
        
      300. 
      
        
    300. 
          1
          
                  assert c3.save() > 0
        
      301. 
      
        
    301. 
          1
          
                  assert e3.save() > 0
        
      302. 
      
        
    302. 
          1
          
                  assert e2.save() > 0
        
      303. 
      
        
    303. 
          
          
          
        
      304. 
      
        
    304. 
          1
          
                  n0 = SelectionNode.new(e2)
        
      305. 
      
        
    305. 
          1
          
                  n0.add_child(n1)
        
      306. 
      
        
    306. 
          
          
          
        
      307. 
      
        
    307. 
          1
          
                  co = create_constraints_object("*", "s4", "M[s1 > s5]")
        
      308. 
      
        
    308. 
          1
          
                  assert co.save > 0
        
      309. 
      
        
    309. 
          
          
          
        
      310. 
      
        
    310. 
          
          
                  # Cas ou la substitution ne doit pas tre faite
        
      311. 
      
        
    311. 
          
          
          
        
      312. 
      
        
    312. 
          1
          
                  scc = SelectionConstraintsChecker.new(n0, n0)
        
      313. 
      
        
    313. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.report.list.size == 0
        
      314. 
      
        
    314. 
          1
          
                  scc.check_and_apply_choice_constraints
        
      315. 
      
        
    315. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.report.list.size == 0
        
      316. 
      
        
    316. 
          
          
          
        
      317. 
      
        
    317. 
          1
          
                  assert n0.children.size == 1
        
      318. 
      
        
    318. 
          1
          
                  assert n0.children[0].data.sigles == "s1"
        
      319. 
      
        
    319. 
          
          
          
        
      320. 
      
        
    320. 
          
          
                  # Cas ou la substitution doit tre tre faite
        
      321. 
      
        
    321. 
          
          
          
        
      322. 
      
        
    322. 
          1
          
                  n0.select
        
      323. 
      
        
    323. 
          1
          
                  scc.check_and_apply_choice_constraints
        
      324. 
      
        
    324. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.report.list.size > 0
        
      325. 
      
        
    325. 
          
          
          
        
      326. 
      
        
    326. 
          
          
                  # Vrifie que le noeud a t substitu
        
      327. 
      
        
    327. 
          1
          
                  assert n0.children.size == 1
        
      328. 
      
        
    328. 
          1
          
                  assert n0.children[0].data.sigles == "s5"       
        
      329. 
      
        
    329. 
          
          
          
        
      330. 
      
        
    330. 
          
          
                  # Vrifie que les enfants ont t adapts
        
      331. 
      
        
    331. 
          1
          
                  assert n0.children[0].children.size == 2
        
      332. 
      
        
    332. 
          1
          
                  assert n0.children[0].children[0].data.sigles == "s6" || n0.children[0].children[0].data.sigles == "s7"
        
      333. 
      
        
    333. 
          1
          
                  assert n0.children[0].children[1].data.sigles == "s6" || n0.children[0].children[1].data.sigles == "s7"
        
      334. 
      
        
    334. 
          1
          
                  assert n0.children[0].children[0].data.sigles != n0.children[0].children[1].data.sigles
        
      335. 
      
        
    335. 
          
          
          
        
      336. 
      
        
    336. 
          
          
              end
        
      337. 
      
        
    337. 
          
          
          
        
      338. 
      
        
    338. 
          1
          
              test "check_all" do 
        
      339. 
      
        
    339. 
          
          
          
        
      340. 
      
        
    340. 
          1
          
                  eo = default_ensemble("eo")
        
      341. 
      
        
    341. 
          1
          
                  n = SelectionNode.new(eo)
        
      342. 
      
        
    342. 
          1
          
                  scc = SelectionConstraintsChecker.new(n, n)
        
      343. 
      
        
    343. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.check_all()
        
      344. 
      
        
    344. 
          1
          
                  assert scc.report.empty?
        
      345. 
      
        
    345. 
          
          
          
        
      346. 
      
        
    346. 
          
          
              end
        
      347. 
      
        
    347.

          end

    test/unit/constraints/structural_constraints_checker_test.rb

    100.0 % covered

    43 relevant lines. 43 lines covered and 0 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          1
          
          require 'test_helper'
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
          
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          1
          
          class StructuralConstraintsCheckerTest < ActiveSupport::TestCase
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
          
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          1
          
              test "list_values" do
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
                  
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.list_values(0, 5) == [0,1,2,3,4,5]
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.list_values(6, 5) == nil
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.list_values(nil, 5) == nil
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.list_values(5, nil) == nil
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
          
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
              end
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
          
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          1
          
              test "product" do
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
          
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.product(nil, [1,2,3]) == nil
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.product([1,2,3], nil) == nil
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.product([1], [2]) == [[1,2]]
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.product([1,2,3], [1]).sort == [[1,1],[2,1],[3,1]].sort
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.product([1],[1,2,3]).sort == [[1,1],[1,2],[1,3]].sort
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.product([1,2], [3,4]).sort == [[1,3],[1,4],[2,3],[2,4]].sort
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
          
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
              end
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
              test "filter_on_sum" do
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
          
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.filter_on_sum(nil , 10) == nil
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.filter_on_sum([] , nil) == nil
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.filter_on_sum([] , 5) == []
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.filter_on_sum([[1]] , 5) == []
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.filter_on_sum([[5]] , 5) == [[5]]
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.filter_on_sum([[1,2,3]] , 10) == []
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.filter_on_sum([[1,2,3,4]] , 10).sort == [[1,2,3,4]]
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.filter_on_sum([[1,2,3],[2,3],[3,3],[1,1,1,3],[6,-6],[6,-6,6]], 6).sort == [[1,2,3],[3,3],[1,1,1,3],[6,-6,6]].sort
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
          
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
              end 
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
          
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          1
          
              test "all_combinations_aux" do
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.all_combinations_aux(nil) == nil
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.all_combinations_aux([]) == nil
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.all_combinations_aux([[1,2,true]]).sort == [[1],[2]].sort
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.all_combinations_aux([[1,2,false]]).sort == [[0],[1],[2]].sort
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.all_combinations_aux([[1,2,false], [3,4,true]]).sort == [[0, 3], [0, 4], [1, 3], [1, 4], [2, 3], [2, 4]].sort
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.all_combinations_aux([[1,2,false]]).sort == [[0],[1],[2]].sort
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
          
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
              end
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
          
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          1
          
              test "all_combinations" do
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
          
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          1
          
                  e1 = default_ensemble("e1")
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          1
          
                  e2 = default_ensemble("e2")
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
          
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          1
          
                  e1.creditsMin = 1
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          1
          
                  e1.creditsMax = 2
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
          
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          1
          
                  e2.creditsMin = 3
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          1
          
                  e2.creditsMax = 4
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
          
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          1
          
                  contenu_arr = [[e1, false],[e2, true]]
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.all_combinations(nil) == nil
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.all_combinations([]) == []
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.all_combinations(contenu_arr).sort == [[0, 3], [0, 4], [1, 3], [1, 4], [2, 3], [2, 4]].sort
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
          
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          1
          
                  contenu_arr = [[e1, false]]
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          1
          
                  assert StructuralConstraintsChecker.all_combinations(contenu_arr).sort == [[0],[1],[2]].sort
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
          
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
              end
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
          
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
          end
        
      71.

    test/unit/constraints/tree_field_constraints_checker_test.rb

    100.0 % covered

    88 relevant lines. 88 lines covered and 0 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          
          
          # encoding: utf-8
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
          
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          1
          
          require 'test_helper'
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
          
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          1
          
          class TreeFieldConstraintsCheckerTest < ActiveSupport::TestCase
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
          
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          1
          
              test 'check_fields' do
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
          
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          1
          
                  eo = default_ensemble("s")
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
                  n = Node.new(eo)
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
          
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          1
          
                  tfcc = TreeFieldConstraintsChecker.new(n, n)
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          1
          
                  assert tfcc.check_fields()
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          1
          
                  assert tfcc.report.empty?
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
          
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          1
          
                  eo.creditsMin = -1
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          1
          
                  assert !tfcc.check_fields()
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          1
          
                  assert !tfcc.report.empty?
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          1
          
                  tfcc.report.erase()
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          1
          
                  eo.creditsMin = 5
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
          
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
                  eo.creditsMax = -1
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          1
          
                  assert !tfcc.check_fields()
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          1
          
                  assert !tfcc.report.empty?
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
                  tfcc.report.erase()
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
                  eo.creditsMax = 5
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
          
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
                  eo.langue = "WRONG"
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1
          
                  assert !tfcc.check_fields()
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1
          
                  assert !tfcc.report.empty?
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
                  tfcc.report.erase()
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
                  eo.langue = "fr"
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
          
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          1
          
                  eo.contenu = "WRONG"        # Contenu non check ici (check_content_existence le fait)
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          1
          
                  assert tfcc.check_fields()
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          1
          
                  assert tfcc.report.empty?
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1
          
                  eo.contenu = nil
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
          
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          1
          
                  eo.validite = -1
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          1
          
                  assert !tfcc.check_fields()
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          1
          
                  assert !tfcc.report.empty?
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          1
          
                  tfcc.report.erase()
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1
          
                  eo.validite = nil
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
          
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          1
          
                  eo.status = "WRONG"
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          1
          
                  assert !tfcc.check_fields()
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          1
          
                  assert !tfcc.report.empty?
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          1
          
                  tfcc.report.erase()
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          1
          
                  eo.status = "actuel"
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                  
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
              end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
          
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          1
          
              test 'check_content_existence' do
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          1
          
                  eo1 = default_ensemble("s1")
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          1
          
                  eo2 = default_ensemble("s2")
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          1
          
                  eo3 = default_ensemble("s3")
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
          
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          1
          
                  eo1.contenu = "s2 1 true, s3 1-2 false"
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
          
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          1
          
                  n1 = Node.new(eo1)
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          1
          
                  n2 = Node.new(eo2)
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          1
          
                  n3 = Node.new(eo3)
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
          
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          1
          
                  tfcc = TreeFieldConstraintsChecker.new(n1, n1)
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          1
          
                  assert !tfcc.check_content_existence()
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          1
          
                  assert !tfcc.report.empty?
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          1
          
                  tfcc.report.erase()
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
          
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          1
          
                  n1.add_child(n3)
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          1
          
                  assert !tfcc.check_content_existence()
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          1
          
                  assert !tfcc.report.empty?
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          1
          
                  tfcc.report.erase()
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
          
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          1
          
                  n1.add_child(n2)
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          1
          
                  assert tfcc.check_content_existence()
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          1
          
                  assert tfcc.report.empty?
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
          
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
              end
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
          
        
      81.

          1
          
              test 'check_content_duplications' do
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
          
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          1
          
                  eo1 = default_ensemble("s1")
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          1
          
                  eo2 = default_ensemble("")
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          1
          
                  eo3 = default_ensemble("s4")
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
          
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          1
          
                  eo2.set_sigles_array(["s2","s3"])
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          1
          
                  n1 = Node.new(eo1)
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          1
          
                  n2 = Node.new(eo2)
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          1
          
                  n3 = Node.new(eo3)
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
          
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          1
          
                  eo1.contenu = "s2 1 true, s4 1-2 false"
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          1
          
                  n1.add_child(n2)
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          1
          
                  n1.add_child(n3)
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
          
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          1
          
                  tfcc = TreeFieldConstraintsChecker.new(n1, n1)
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          1
          
                  assert tfcc.check_content_duplications()
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          1
          
                  assert tfcc.report.empty?
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
          
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          1
          
                  eo1.contenu = "s2 1 true, s2 1-2 false"
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          1
          
                  assert !tfcc.check_content_duplications()
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          1
          
                  assert !tfcc.report.empty?
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          1
          
                  tfcc.report.erase()
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
          
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          1
          
                  eo1.contenu = "s3 1 true, s2 1-2 false"
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          1

      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          1
          
                  assert !tfcc.report.empty?
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          1

    test/unit/constraints/tree_structural_constraints_checker_test.rb

    100.0 % covered

    1.

      2.

      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          1
          
          require 'test_helper'
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
          
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          1
          
          class TreeStructuralConstraintsCheckerTest < ActiveSupport::TestCase
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
          
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          1
          
              test 'check_credits_children' do 
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
          
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          1
          
                  e1 = default_ensemble("s1")
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
                  e1.creditsMin = 5
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          1
          
                  e1.creditsMax = 5
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          1
          
                  e1.contenu = "s2 1 true, s3 1-2 true"
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
          
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          1
          
                  e2 = default_ensemble("s2")
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          1
          
                  e2.creditsMin = 5
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          1
          
                  e2.creditsMax = 5
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          1
          
                  e2.contenu = nil
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
          
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          1
          
                  e3 = default_ensemble("s3")
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          1
          
                  e3.creditsMin = 5
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          1
          
                  e3.creditsMax = 5
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
                  e3.contenu = nil
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
          
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          1
          
                  n1 = Node.new(e1)
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
                  n2 = Node.new(e2)
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
                  n3 = Node.new(e3)
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
          
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
                  n1.add_child(n2)
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1
          
                  n1.add_child(n3)
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
          
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
                  tcc = TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.new(n1, n1)
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
                  assert !tcc.check_credits_children()
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
                  assert !tcc.report.empty?
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          
        
      35.

          1
          
                  tcc.report.erase()

    36.

          1

          1

      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          1
          
                  assert tcc.report.empty?
