      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          
          
          =begin
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          
          
              
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          
          
                            20                _ = obligatoire
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          
          
                      /      |      \
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          
          
                  10_       5<9       2<4
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          
          
              /  /  \  \    /|\        |
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          
          
             5_ 5    5  5  5 2  4_     3
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          
          
              
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          
          
                               e1             _ = obligatoire
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          
          
                      /         |       \
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          
          
                  e2           e3           e4
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          
          
              /  /  \  \      / | \          |
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          
          
             e5 c6   c7 c8 c9  c10 c11      c12
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          
          
          
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          
          
          =end
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          
          
              
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          1
          
              def tree_to_string_arr(node)
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          24
          
                  res = []
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          24
          
                  node.children.each do |child|
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          22
          
                      res << tree_to_string_arr(child)
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          
          
                  end
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          24
          
                  str = node.data.sigles + " "
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          24
          
                  str += node.data.creditsMax.to_s + " "
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          24
          
                  str += node.data.creditsMax.to_s + " "
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          24
          
                  str += node.to_s + " - "
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          24
          
                  res << str
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          24
          
                  return res
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          
          
              end
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          
          
          
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          1
          
              test 'check_strict_credits test' do
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          
          
          
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          1
          
                  hash = build_tree()
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          
          
          
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          1
          
                  root = hash["n1"]
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          
          
          
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          1
          
                  arr = tree_to_string_arr(root)
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          
          
          
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          1
          
                  assert TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["n12"], 3, root)
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          1
          
                  assert TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["n5"], 5, root)
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          
          
          
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          1
          
                  assert TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["n4"], 3, root)
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          1
          
                  assert TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["n4"], 0, root)
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          1
          
                  assert !TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["n4"], 2, root)
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          1
          
                  assert !TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["n4"], 4, root)
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          
          
          
        
      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          1
          
                  assert TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["n3"], 6, root)
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          1
          
                  assert TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["n3"], 9, root)
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          1
          
                  assert TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["n3"], 4, root)
        
      270. 
      
        
    270. 
          1
          
                  assert !TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["n3"], 5, root)
        
      271. 
      
        
    271. 
          1
          
                  assert !TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["n3"], 2, root)
        
      272. 
      
        
    272. 
          1
          
                  assert !TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["n3"], 7, root)
        
      273. 
      
        
    273. 
          
          
          
        
      274. 
      
        
    274. 
          1
          
                  assert TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["n2"], 5, root)
        
      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          1
          
                  assert TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["n2"], 10, root)
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          1
          
                  assert TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["n2"], 15, root)
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          1
          
                  assert TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["n2"], 20, root)
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          1
          
                  assert !TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["n2"], 0, root)
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          1
          
                  assert !TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["n2"], 6, root)
        
      280. 
      
        
    280. 
          
          
          
        
      281. 
      
        
    281. 
          1
          
                  assert TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["n1"], 10, root)
        
      282.

          1
          
                  assert TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.check_strict_credits(hash["n1"], 13, root)
        
      283.

          1

      284.

                  arr2 = tree_to_string_arr(root)

                  assert arr == arr2

              def build_tree()
        
      300.

      301.

          1
          
                  e1 = default_ensemble("e1")
        
      302.

          1
          
                  e2 = default_ensemble("e2")
        
      303. 
      
        
    303. 
          1
          
                  e3 = default_ensemble("e3")
        
      304. 
      
        
    304. 
          1
          
                  e4 = default_ensemble("e4")
        
      305. 
      
        
    305. 
          1
          
                  e5 = default_ensemble("e5")
        
      306. 
      
        
    306. 
          1
          
                  c6 = default_cours("c6")
        
      307. 
      
        
    307. 
          1
          
                  c7 = default_cours("c7")
        
      308.

          1

      309. 
      
        
    309. 
          1
          
                  c9 = default_cours("c9")
        
      310. 
      
        
    310. 
          1

      311. 
      
        
    311. 
          1
          
                  c11 = default_cours("c11")
        
      312. 
      
        
    312. 
          1
          
                  c12 = default_cours("c12")
        
      313. 
      
        
    313. 
          
          
          
        
      314. 
      
        
    314. 
          1
          
                  n1 = Node.new(e1)
        
      315. 
      
        
    315. 
          1
          
                  n2 = Node.new(e2)
        
      316.

          1
          
                  n3 = Node.new(e3)
        
      317.

          1
          
                  n4 = Node.new(e4)

          1

          1
          
                  e1.contenu = "e2 1 true, e3 1 false, e4 3 false"

          1
          
                  e2.contenu = "e5 1 true, c6 1 false, c7 1 false, c8 1 false"

      393.

          1
          
              test "check_strict_credits_on_instance test" do
        
      399. 
      
        
    399. 
          
          
          
        
      400. 
      
        
    400. 
          
          
                  # Cas simple
        
      401. 
      
        
    401. 
          
          
                  
        
      402. 
      
        
    402. 
          1
          
                  e1 = default_ensemble("e1")
        
      403. 
      
        
    403. 
          1
          
                  c1 = default_cours("c1")
        
      404. 
      
        
    404. 
          1
          
                  c2 = default_cours("c2")
        
      405. 
      
        
    405. 
          
          
          
        
      406. 
      
        
    406. 
          1
          
                  e1.contenu = "c1 1 false, c2 1-2 false"
        
      407. 
      
        
    407. 
          1
          
                  e1.creditsMax = 5
        
      408. 
      
        
    408. 
          1
          
                  e1.creditsMin = 5
        
      409. 
      
        
    409. 
          
          
          
        
      410. 
      
        
    410. 
          1
          
                  c1.creditsMax = 5
        
      411. 
      
        
    411. 
          1
          
                  c1.creditsMin = 5
        
      412. 
      
        
    412. 
          
          
          
        
      413. 
      
        
    413. 
          1
          
                  c2.creditsMax = 5
        
      414. 
      
        
    414. 
          1
          
                  c2.creditsMin = 5
        
      415. 
      
        
    415. 
          
          
          
        
      416. 
      
        
    416. 
          1
          
                  n1 = Node.new(e1)
        
      417. 
      
        
    417. 
          1
          
                  n2 = Node.new(c1)
        
      418. 
      
        
    418. 
          1
          
                  n3 = Node.new(c2)
        
      419. 
      
        
    419. 
          
          
          
        
      420. 
      
        
    420. 
          1
          
                  n1.add_child(n2)
        
      421. 
      
        
    421. 
          1
          
                  n1.add_child(n3)
        
      422. 
      
        
    422. 
          
          
          
        
      423. 
      
        
    423. 
          1
          
                  e1.contenu = "c1 1 false, c2 1-2 false"

    424. 
          
          
          
        
      425. 
      
        
    425. 
          1

      426. 
      
        
    426. 
          1
          
                  assert tscc.check_strict_credits_on_instance()
        
      427. 
      
        
    427. 
          1
          
                  assert tscc.report.empty?
        
      428. 
      
        
    428. 
          
          
          
        
      429. 
      
        
    429. 
          1

      510.

          1

      511.

      513. 
      
        
    513. 
          1
          
                  assert tscc.check_strict_credits_on_instance()
        
      514. 
      
        
    514. 
          1
          
                  assert tscc.report.empty?
        
      515. 
      
        
    515. 
          
          
          
        
      516. 
      
        
    516. 
          1
          
                  e11.creditsMax = "0"
        
      517. 
      
        
    517. 
          1
          
                  e11.creditsMin = "0"
        
      518. 
      
        
    518. 
          
          
          
        
      519. 
      
        
    519. 
          1
          
                  tscc = TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.new(n1, n1)
        
      520. 
      
        
    520. 
          1
          
                  assert tscc.check_strict_credits_on_instance()
        
      521. 
      
        
    521. 
          1
          
                  assert tscc.report.empty?
        
      522. 
      
        
    522. 
          
          
          
        
      523. 
      
        
    523. 
          
          
              end
        
      524. 
      
        
    524. 
          
          
          
        
      525. 
      
        
    525. 
          1
          
              test 'make_children_array test' do
        
      526. 
      
        
    526. 
          
          
          
        
      527. 
      
        
    527. 
          1
          
                  e1 = default_ensemble("e1")
        
      528. 
      
        
    528. 
          1
          
                  e2 = default_ensemble("e2")
        
      529. 
      
        
    529. 
          1
          
                  e3 = default_ensemble("e3")
        
      530. 
      
        
    530. 
          
          
          
        
      531. 
      
        
    531. 
          1
          
                  e1.contenu = "e2 1 true, e3 1-2 false"
        
      532. 
      
        
    532. 
          
          
          
        
      533. 
      
        
    533. 
          1
          
                  n1 = Node.new(e1)
        
      534. 
      
        
    534. 
          1
          
                  n2 = Node.new(e2)
        
      535. 
      
        
    535. 
          1
          
                  n3 = Node.new(e3)
        
      536. 
      
        
    536. 
          
          
          
        
      537. 
      
        
    537. 
          1
          
                  assert TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.make_children_array(nil) == [nil, nil]
        
      538. 
      
        
    538. 
          1
          
                  assert TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.make_children_array(n1) == [:child_miss_error, nil]
        
      539. 
      
        
    539. 
          
          
                  
        
      540. 
      
        
    540. 
          1
          
                  n1.add_child(n2)
        
      541. 
      
        
    541. 
          1
          
                  assert TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.make_children_array(n1) == [:child_miss_error, nil]
        
      542. 
      
        
    542. 
          
          
                  
        
      543. 
      
        
    543. 
          1
          
                  n1.add_child(n3)
        
      544. 
      
        
    544. 
          1
          
                  c_arr, n_arr = TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.make_children_array(n1)
        
      545. 
      
        
    545. 
          1
          
                  assert c_arr[0][0].sigles == "e2"
        
      546. 
      
        
    546. 
          1
          
                  assert c_arr[0][1] == true
        
      547. 
      
        
    547. 
          1
          
                  assert c_arr[1][0].sigles == "e3"
        
      548. 
      
        
    548. 
          1
          
                  assert c_arr[1][1] == false
        
      549. 
      
        
    549. 
          
          
          
        
      550. 
      
        
    550. 
          1
          
                  assert c_arr[0][0] == n_arr[0].data
        
      551. 
      
        
    551. 
          1
          
                  assert c_arr[1][0] == n_arr[1].data
        
      552. 
      
        
    552. 
          
          
          
        
      553. 
      
        
    553. 
          
          
              end
        
      554. 
      
        
    554. 
          
          
          
        
      555. 
      
        
    555. 
          1
          
              test "check_all" do
        
      556. 
      
        
    556. 
          
          
          
        
      557. 
      
        
    557. 
          1
          
                  eo = default_ensemble("s")
        
      558. 
      
        
    558. 
          1
          
                  n = Node.new(eo)
        
      559. 
      
        
    559. 
          1
          
                  tscc = TreeStructuralConstraintsChecker.new(n, n)
        
      560. 
      
        
    560. 
          1
          
                  assert tscc.check_all()
        
      561. 
      
        
    561. 
          1
          
                  assert tscc.check_all_except_parent()
        
      562. 
      
        
    562. 
          1
          
                  assert tscc.report.empty?
        
      563. 
      
        
    563. 
          
          
          
        
      564. 
      
        
    564. 
          
          
              end
        
      565. 
      
        
    565.

          end

              def check_create_for(pmodule_id, cond, effet, validity)
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
          
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          5
          
                  begin
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          5
          
                      Contrainte.create!(
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                          :pmodule_id => pmodule_id,
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                          :cond => cond,
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
                          :effet => effet
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                          )
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
                  rescue
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          1
          
                      assert !validity
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
                  else
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          4
          
                      assert validity
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
                  end
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
          
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
              end

    test/unit/ensemble_contenu_test.rb

    1. 
          1
          
          require 'test_helper'
        
      2.

      3.

          1
          
          class EnsembleContenuTest < ActiveSupport::TestCase
        
      4.

      5.

          1
          
              def create_module(sigle)
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
          
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          14
          
                  Pmodule.create(
        
      8.

                  :creditsMax => 7,

                      :creditsMin => 7,
        
      10.

              test "update" do

    104. 
          1
          
                  r = @cours_loader.load_a_cours(params, extern_id, report, false)
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
          
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          1
          
                  assert r == true
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          1
          
                  assert report.empty?
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
          
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          1
          
                  r = @cours_loader.load_a_cours(params, extern_id, report, false)
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                  # Cas de mise  jour o aucun changement n'est propos 
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          1
          
                  assert r == true
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          1
          
                  assert report.empty?
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
          
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          1
          
                  hashes["activites"]["1"][0]["POIDS"] = "10"
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
                  # Cas de mise  jour o un changement est propos 
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          1
          
                  load_and_check_report(hashes, extern_id, "update", 1, false)
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
          
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
              end
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
          
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          1
          
              test "strict errors" do
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
          
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          1
          
                  hashes = load_files()
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
          
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          1
          
                  extern_id = "1"
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
          
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          1
          
                  tmp = hashes["activites"]["1"][0]["POIDS"]
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          1
          
                  hashes["activites"]["1"][0]["POIDS"] = "-1"
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          1
          
                  load_and_check_report(hashes, extern_id, "strict error", 2, false)
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          1
          
                  hashes["activites"]["1"][0]["POIDS"] = tmp
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
          
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          1
          
                  tmp = hashes["activites"]["1"][0]["VOL_TOT1"]
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          1
          
                  hashes["activites"]["1"][0]["VOL_TOT1"] = "-1"
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          1
          
                  load_and_check_report(hashes, extern_id, "strict error", 1, false)
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
          
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
                  # Inutile de tester d'autres erreurs car les erreurs causes lors d'un chargement de cours sont celles 
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                  # cause  la cration du cours uniquement (d'autres tests sont prvu pour cette situation).
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                  # Le fait de charger un cours n'induit pas d'erreur supplmentaire.
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
          
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
              end
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
          
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
          end
        
      142.

              def build_loader()
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
          
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          6
          
                  fnames = [{:name => "activites", :path => File.expand_path("test/unit/import_manager/files/activites.test")}, 
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                            {:name => "activites_root", :path => File.expand_path("test/unit/import_manager/files/activites_root.test")}, 
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
                            {:name => "EPL_grp", :path => File.expand_path("test/unit/import_manager/files/EPL_grp.test")}, 
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
                            {:name => "prof", :path => File.expand_path("test/unit/import_manager/files/prof.test")}]
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          6
          
                  loader = CSVLoader.new(fnames)

      14.

          6

              test "load_files" do 
        
      19.

    20. 
          
          
                  # Le fichier n'existe pas

      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
                  fnames = [{:name => "activites", :path => File.expand_path("test/unit/import_manager/files/WRONG.test")}]
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          1
          
                  loader = CSVLoader.new(fnames)

    24.

          1

          1
          
                  assert !r
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1
          
                  assert fname.include?("test/unit/import_manager/files/WRONG.test")  # fname contient chemin complet, vrifie que la fin correspond

          1
          
                  assert data == :read_error

              # Test stack_initial_size, stack_current_size, init_stack et reinit_stack
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          1
          
              test "stack size during proccess" do 
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
          
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          1
          
                  loader = build_loader()
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          1
          
                  loader.load_files
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
          
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.stack_initial_size() == 0
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.stack_current_size() == 0
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
          
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          1
          
                  assert !loader.init_stack("wrong")
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.stack_initial_size() == 0
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.stack_current_size() == 0
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
          
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          1
          
                  assert !loader.init_stack(nil)
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.stack_initial_size() == 0
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.stack_current_size() == 0
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
          
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.init_stack("racine")
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.stack_initial_size() == 3
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.stack_current_size() == 3
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
          
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.load_next() # Le contenu est correcte, possible de tout charger sans erreurs
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.stack_initial_size() == 3
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.stack_current_size() == 2
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
          
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.load_next() 
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          1

          1

      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
          
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.load_next()

          1

          1

          1
          
              test "load_module" do
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
          
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          1
          
                  loader = build_loader()
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          1
          
                  loader.load_files
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          1
          
                  loader.init_stack("racine")
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          1
          
                  report = Report.new()
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
          
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          1
          
                  params1 = {}
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.load_module(params1, "1", report)
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          1
          
                  assert report.empty?
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          1
          
                  assert params1[:mtype] == "cours"
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          1
          
                  assert params1[:sigles] == "LBIR1210"
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.reports.empty?
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
          
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          1
          
                  params2 = {}
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.load_module(params2, "2", report)
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          1
          
                  assert report.empty?
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          1
          
                  assert params2[:mtype] == "cours"
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          1
          
                  assert params2[:sigles] == "LBIR1203"
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.reports.empty?
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
                  
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          1
          
                  params3 = {}
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.load_module(params3, "3", report)
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          1
          
                  assert report.empty?
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          1
          
                  assert params3[:mtype] == "ensemble"
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          1
          
                  assert params3[:sigles] == "LBIR1200I"
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.reports.empty?
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                  
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          1
          
                  params4 = {}
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          1
          
                  assert !loader.load_module(params4, "-1", report)
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          1
          
                  assert !report.empty?
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.reports.size == 1
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          1
          
                  report.erase
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
          
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          1
          
                  assert !loader.load_module(params4, "1000", report)
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          1
          
                  assert !report.empty?
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.reports.size == 2
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
          
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
              end
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
          
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
              # Processus complet, ce test joue le rle du contrleur lors d'un cas complet
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          1
          
              test "load_next" do 
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
          
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          1
          
                  loader = build_loader()
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          1
          
                  loader.load_files
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
          
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
                  # Ajout d'une erreur 
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          1
          
                  loader.hashes["activites"]["1"][0]["POIDS"] = "-1"
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
          
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          1
          
                  loader.init_stack("racine")
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
          
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
                  # Chargement du module "2", pas de probleme
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
          
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.state == :waiting
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          1
          
                  r = loader.load_next()
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          1
          
                  assert r[:flag] == "valid"
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          1
          
                  assert r[:report].empty?
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          1
          
                  assert r[:stack_initial_size] == 3
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          1
          
                  assert r[:stack_current_size] == 2
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          1
          
                  assert r[:current] == nil 
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
          
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
                  # Chargement du module "1", l'erreur survient
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
          
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.state == :waiting
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          1
          
                  r = loader.load_next()
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.state == :wait_feedback
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          1
          
                  assert r[:flag] == "error"
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          1
          
                  assert !r[:report].empty?
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          1
          
                  assert r[:mod].is_a?(CoursObject)
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          1
          
                  assert r[:stack_initial_size] == 3
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          1
          
                  assert r[:stack_current_size] == 1   
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          1
          
                  assert r[:current] == nil
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
          
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          1
          
                  params = r[:mod].extract_params
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
          
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          1
          
                  assert params[:creditsMin] == -1
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          1
          
                  assert params[:creditsMax] == -1
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
          
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
                  # Correction de l'erreur
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
          
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          1
          
                  params[:creditsMax] = 4
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          1
          
                  params[:creditsMin] = 4
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
          
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          1
          
                  loader.set_feedback(params ,nil)
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          1
          
                  assert loader.state == :feedback_received
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
          
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
                  # Prise en compte de la correction
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
          
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          1
          
                  r = loader.load_next()
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          1
          
                  assert r[:flag] == "valid"
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          1
          
                  assert r[:report].empty?
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          1
          
                  assert r[:stack_initial_size] == 3
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          1
          
                  assert r[:stack_current_size] == 1
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          1
          
                  assert r[:current] == nil 
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
          
        
      217. 
      
        
    217.

          1

      309.

          1

          1

          1

      316. 
      
        
    316. 
          1
          
                  assert r[:mod].creditsMax == 28
        
      317. 
      
        
    317. 
          
          
          
        
      318. 
      
        
    318. 
          
          
                  # Force la sauvegarde de ce module inconnu en tant que tel
        
      319. 
      
        
    319. 
          
          
          
        
      320.

          1
          
                  params = r[:mod].extract_params
        
      321.

          1

          1

          1

          1

      328.

          1
          
                  assert !r[:report].empty?       # Existe un warning car ensemble sauv avec un contenu vide
        
      329. 
      
        
    329. 
          1
          
                  assert r[:stack_initial_size] == 2
        
      330. 
      
        
    330. 
          1
          
                  assert r[:stack_current_size] == 1
        
      331. 
      
        
    331. 
          1
          
                  assert r[:current] == nil 
        
      332. 
      
        
    332. 
          
          
          
        
      333. 
      
        
    333.

      334. 
      
        
    334. 
          
          
          
        
      335.

          1
          
                  r = loader.load_next()
        
      336.

          1

      337. 
      
        
    337. 
          1

      338. 
      
        
    338. 
          1

          1

          1

          1

      342.

    test/unit/import_manager/csv_to_hashes_test.rb

    100.0 % covered

    23 relevant lines. 23 lines covered and 0 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          
          
          
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          1
          
          class CsvToHashesTest < ActiveSupport::TestCase
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
            
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          1
          
            test "load" do
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
          
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          1
          
                @fnames = [{:name => "hash.test", :path => "XXXX"}]
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          1
          
                h = CsvHasher.new(@fnames)
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          1
          
                b, r = h.load
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          1
          
                assert !b
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
                assert r == :read_error
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
          
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          1
          
                @fnames = [{:name => "hash.test", :path => File.expand_path("test/unit/import_manager/files/hash2.test")}]
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          1
          
                h = CsvHasher.new(@fnames)
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          1
          
                b, r = h.load
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          1
          
                assert !b
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          1
          
                assert r == :format_error
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
          
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          1
          
                @fnames = [{:name => "hash.test", :path => File.expand_path("test/unit/import_manager/files/hash.test")}]
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          1
          
                h = CsvHasher.new(@fnames)
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          1
          
                b, r = h.load
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          1
          
                assert b
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
          
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          1
          
                hash = r["hash.test"]
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
                assert hash!=nil
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
          
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1
          
                assert hash.keys.sort == ["1","2","3"]
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
                assert hash["1"][0] == {"A"=>"1","B"=>"11","C"=>"12","D"=>"13"}
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1
          
                assert hash["1"][1] == {"A"=>"1","B"=>"11_","C"=>"12_","D"=>"13_"}
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1
          
                assert hash["2"][0] == {"A"=>"2","B"=>"21","C"=>"22","D"=>"23"}
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
                assert hash["3"][0] == {"A"=>"3","B"=>"31","C"=>"32","D"=>"33"}
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
            end
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
          end
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
          
        
      37.

          class EnsembleLoaderTest < ActiveSupport::TestCase

              def load_cours(extern_id, hashes)
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
          
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          10
          
                  report = Report.new
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          10
          
                  params = {}
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
          
        
      9.

          10

          10

    12. 
          10

          10

              def load_files()

      19.

          5
          
                  @fnames = [{:name => "activites", :path => File.expand_path("test/unit/import_manager/files/activites.test")},
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                         {:name => "prof", :path => File.expand_path("test/unit/import_manager/files/prof.test")},
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                         {:name => "EPL_grp", :path => File.expand_path("test/unit/import_manager/files/EPL_grp.test")}]

          5
          
                  h = CsvHasher.new(@fnames)

          5

              def load_and_check_report(hashes, extern_id, cat, number, res)
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
          
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          7
          
                  report = Report.new
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          7
          
                  params = {}
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
          
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          7
          
                  @ensemble_loader = EnsembleLoader.new(hashes)
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          7
          
                  r = @ensemble_loader.load_an_ensemble(params, extern_id, report, false)
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          7
          
                  assert r == res
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          7
          
                  assert report.categories? == [cat]
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          7
          
                  assert report.get_category(cat).size == number
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
          
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          7
          
                  return params
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
          
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
              end
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
          
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          1
          
              test "normal case" do
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
          
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          1
          
                  hashes = load_files()
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
          
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          1
          
                  load_cours("1", hashes)
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          1
          
                  load_cours("2", hashes)
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          1
          
                  report = Report.new()
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          1
          
                  params = {}
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          1
          
                  extern_id = "3"
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
          
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          1
          
                  @ensemble_loader = EnsembleLoader.new(hashes)
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          1
          
                  r = @ensemble_loader.load_an_ensemble(params, extern_id, report, false)
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
          
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          1
          
                  assert r == true
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          1
          
                  assert report.empty?
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
          
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          1
          
                  e = EnsembleObject.new()
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
          
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          1
          
                  id = Sigle.find_by_sigle("LBIR1200I").pmodule_id
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          1
          
                  assert(id != nil)
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
          
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          1
          
                  e.load(id)
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
          
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          1
          
                  assert e.sigles == "LBIR1200I"
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          1
          
                  assert e.creditsMin == 4
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          1
          
                  assert e.creditsMax == 10
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          1
          
                  assert e.intitule == "intit"
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          1
          
                  assert e.langue == "fr"
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          1
          
                  assert e.dptCharge == "AGRO"
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          1
          
                  assert e.commentaire == "commentaire sur l'option."
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          1
          
                  assert e.mtype == "ensemble"
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          1
          
                  assert e.validite == 2012
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          1
          
                  assert e.import_commentaire == nil
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          1
          
                  assert (e.contenu == "LBIR1210 1-2-3 true, LBIR1203 1-2-3 false" || e.contenu == "LBIR1203 1-2-3 false, LBIR1210 1-2-3 true")

          1

          1

          1

      156.

          1
          
                  tmp = hashes["activites"]["3"][0]

          1
          
                  hashes["activites"]["3"][0] = nil
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          1
          
                  load_and_check_report(hashes, extern_id, "error", 2, false)

    159. 
          1

      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
          
        
      161.

          1
          
                  tmp = hashes["activites"]["1"][0]

    162. 
          1

    163. 
          1

          class VersionManagerTest < ActionView::TestCase

              def partial_compaire(eo, params)

          1
          
              def actuel_and_archive?(s1, act_params, s2, arch_params)
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
          
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
                  # Verifie que la nouvelle version est correcte
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                  id = PmoduleObject.id?(s1)
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                  assert id != nil
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                  eo = EnsembleObject.new()
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                  eo.load(id)
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                  assert eo.compaire(act_params) == nil
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                  assert eo.status == "actuel"
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                  # Verifie que l'archive est correcte
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
          
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                  id = PmoduleObject.id?(s2)
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                  archive_eo = EnsembleObject.new()
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                  archive_eo.load(id)
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                  diff = archive_eo.compaire(arch_params)
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
          
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                  # 1 diffrence : le sigle
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
          
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                  assert diff.length == 1 
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                  assert diff[:sigles] != nil 
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                  assert archive_eo.status == "archive"
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
          
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
              end
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
              
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          1
          
              def future_to_actuel?(fut_s, fut_params, act_s, arch_s = nil, arch_params = nil)
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
             
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                  id = PmoduleObject.id?(fut_s)
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                  assert id == nil
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
          
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                  id = PmoduleObject.id?(act_s)
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                  assert id != nil
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                  eo = EnsembleObject.new()
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                  eo.load(id)
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                  diff = eo.compaire(fut_params)
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                  # 1 diffrence : le sigle
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                  assert diff.length == 1 
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                  assert diff[:sigles] != nil 
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                  assert eo.status == "actuel"
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
          
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                  if(arch_s != nil)
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                      archive_eo = EnsembleObject.new()  # Verification de l'archive
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                      id = PmoduleObject.id?(arch_s)
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                      archive_eo.load(id)
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                      diff = archive_eo.compaire(arch_params)
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                      # 1 diffrence : le sigle
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                      assert diff.length == 1 
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                      assert diff[:sigles] != nil 
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                      assert archive_eo.status == "archive"
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                  end
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
          
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
              end
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
          
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          1
          
              def ensemble_saved?(sigle, params)
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
          
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                  id = PmoduleObject.id?(sigle)
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                  assert id != nil
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
          
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                  eo = EnsembleObject.new()
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                  eo.load(id)
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
                  assert eo.compaire(params) == nil
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
          
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
              end
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
          
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          1
          
              test "is_main_version?" do
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
              
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.is_main_version?("abc")
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
          
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.is_main_version?("")
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.is_main_version?(nil)
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
          
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.is_main_version?("abc_(2013)")
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.is_main_version?("abc_(2013-04-05 15:22:20 +0200)")
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
              
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
              end
        
      97.
