    98. 
          1
          
              test "is_archive?" do
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
              
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.is_archive_version?("abc")
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.is_archive_version?("")
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.is_archive_version?(nil)
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
          
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.is_archive_version?("abc_(2013)")
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.is_archive_version?("abc_(2013-04-05 15:22:20 +0200)")
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
              
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
              end
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
          
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          1
          
              test "archive" do
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
          
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.archive(nil)
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.archive("")
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.archive("c")
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.archive("e")
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
          
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          1
          
                  c = default_cours("c")
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          1
          
                  c.save
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
          
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.archive("c")
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
          
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          1
          
                  e = default_ensemble("e")
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          1
          
                  e.save
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
          
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.archive("e")
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
          
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                  # Suite dans le test de "recursive_archive"
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
              
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
              end
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
          
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
              # Cas : e (ensemble) contient e2 (ensemble) qui contient c (ensemble)
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
              #       e est archiv et remplac
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          1
          
              test "recursive archive" do
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
          
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          1
          
                  eo1 = default_ensemble("e")
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          1
          
                  eo2 = default_ensemble("e2")
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          1
          
                  co1 = default_cours("c")
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
          
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          1
          
                  eo1.contenu = "e2 1 false"
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          1
          
                  eo2.contenu = "c 1 false"
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
          
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          1
          
                  id1 = co1.save
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          1
          
                  id2 = eo2.save
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          1
          
                  id3 = eo1.save
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
          
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          1
          
                  assert id1 > 0
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          1
          
                  assert id2 > 0
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          1
          
                  assert id3 > 0
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
          
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          1
          
                  r = VersionManager.recursive_archive(eo1)
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
          
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          1
          
                  assert r == true
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          1
          
                  assert Pmodule.all.length == 6
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
          
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          1
          
                  assert PmoduleObject.id?("c") != nil 
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          1
          
                  assert PmoduleObject.id?("e2") != nil 
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          1
          
                  assert PmoduleObject.id?("e") != nil
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
          
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          1
          
                  tmp = CoursObject.new()
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          1
          
                  tmp.load(id1) 
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          1
          
                  assert tmp.compaire(co1.extract_params) == nil
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
          
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          1
          
                  tmp = EnsembleObject.new()
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          1
          
                  tmp.load(id2) 
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          1
          
                  assert tmp.compaire(eo2.extract_params) == nil
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
          
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          1
          
                  tmp = EnsembleObject.new()
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          1
          
                  tmp.load(id3) 
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          1
          
                  assert tmp.compaire(eo1.extract_params) == nil
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
          
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          1
          
                  c_arch = false
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          1
          
                  e2_arch = false
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          1
          
                  e_arch = false
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
          
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          1
          
                  Sigle.all.each do |s|
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          6
          
                      if(s.sigle.index("c_(")!=nil)
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          1
          
                          c_arch = true
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          1
          
                          assert Pmodule.find(s.pmodule_id).status == "archive"
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          5
          
                      elsif(s.sigle.index("e2_(")!=nil)
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          1
          
                          e2_arch = true
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          1
          
                          assert Pmodule.find(s.pmodule_id).status == "archive"
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          4
          
                      elsif(s.sigle.index("e_(")!=nil)
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          1
          
                          e_arch = true
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          1
          
                          assert Pmodule.find(s.pmodule_id).status == "archive"
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
                      end           
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
                  end
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
          
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          1
          
                  assert c_arch
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          1
          
                  assert e2_arch
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          1
          
                  assert e_arch
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
          
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
              end
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
          
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          1
          
              test "try_saving_module" do
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
                  
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          1
          
                  e = default_ensemble("e") 
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          1
          
                  r = Report.new()
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          1
          
                  n = Pmodule.all.size
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
          
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
                  # introduction d'une erreur
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          1
          
                  e.creditsMax = "-1"
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
          
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
          
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
                  # Tentative de sauvegarde du module
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
          
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.try_saving_module(r, e)
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          1
          
                  assert !r.empty?
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          1
          
                  assert Pmodule.all.size == n
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
          
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
                  # correction de l'erreur
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          1
          
                  e.creditsMax = e.creditsMin
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          1
          
                  r.erase()
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
          
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
                  # Tentative de sauvegarde du module
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
                  
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.try_saving_module(r, e)
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          1
          
                  assert r.empty?
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          1
          
                  assert Pmodule.all.size == n + 1
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
          
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          
          
              end
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
          
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          1
          
              test "try_updating_module" do
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          
          
                      
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          1
          
                  e = default_ensemble("e")
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          1
          
                  id = e.save()
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          
          
          
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          1
          
                  r = Report.new()
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          1
          
                  n = Pmodule.all.size
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          
          
          
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          
          
                  # Premier cas, sans cration d'archive
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          
          
                  ######################################
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          
          
          
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          
          
                  # introduction d'une erreur
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          
          
          
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          1
          
                  params = e.extract_params()
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          1
          
                  params[:creditsMax] = "-1"
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          
          
          
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          
          
                  # Tentative de mise  jour du module
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          
          
          
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.try_updating_module(r, e, params, false)
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          1
          
                  assert !r.empty?
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          1
          
                  assert Pmodule.all.size == n
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          
          
          
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          
          
                  # correction de l'erreur
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          
          
          
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          1
          
                  params[:creditsMax] = params[:creditsMin]
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          1
          
                  r.erase()
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          
          
          
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          
          
                  # Tentative de mise  jour du module
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          
          
          
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.try_updating_module(r, e, params, false)
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          1
          
                  assert r.empty?
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          1
          
                  assert Pmodule.all.size == n
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          
          
          
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          
          
          
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          
          
                  # Mme schma mais avec la demande d'archive (dernier paramtre  true)
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          
          
                  #######################################################################
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          
          
          
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          
          
                  # rintroduction de l'erreur
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          
          
          
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          1
          
                  params = e.extract_params()
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          1
          
                  params[:creditsMax] = "-1"
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          
          
          
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          
          
                  # Tentative de mise  jour du module
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          
          
          
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.try_updating_module(r, e, params, true)
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          1
          
                  assert !r.empty?
        
      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          1
          
                  assert Pmodule.all.size == n
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          
          
          
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          
          
                  # correction de l'erreur
        
      270. 
      
        
    270. 
          
          
          
        
      271. 
      
        
    271. 
          1
          
                  params[:creditsMax] = params[:creditsMin]
        
      272. 
      
        
    272. 
          1
          
                  r.erase()
        
      273. 
      
        
    273. 
          
          
          
        
      274. 
      
        
    274. 
          
          
                  # Tentative de mise  jour du module
        
      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          
          
          
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.try_updating_module(r, e, params, true)
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          1
          
                  assert r.empty?
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          1
          
                  assert Pmodule.all.size == n + 1 # +1 car archive cre
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          
          
          
        
      280. 
      
        
    280. 
          
          
              end
        
      281. 
      
        
    281. 
          
          
          
        
      282. 
      
        
    282. 
          1
          
              test "in_future?" do
        
      283. 
      
        
    283. 
          
          
                  
        
      284. 
      
        
    284. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.in_future?(Date.today.year - 1)
        
      285. 
      
        
    285. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.in_future?(Date.today.year + 1)
        
      286. 
      
        
    286. 
          
          
          
        
      287. 
      
        
    287. 
          
          
              end 
        
      288. 
      
        
    288. 
          
          
          
        
      289. 
      
        
    289. 
          1
          
              test "adapt_content" do 
        
      290. 
      
        
    290. 
          
          
          
        
      291. 
      
        
    291. 
          1
          
                  t = Time.now.to_s
        
      292. 
      
        
    292. 
          
          
                  
        
      293. 
      
        
    293. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.adapt_content(nil, t) == ""
        
      294. 
      
        
    294. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.adapt_content([], t) == ""
        
      295. 
      
        
    295. 
          
          
                 
        
      296. 
      
        
    296. 
          1
          
                  ca = [["a", "1", true], ["b", "2", false], ["c", "1-2", true]]
        
      297. 
      
        
    297. 
          1
          
                  new_c = VersionManager.adapt_content(ca, t)
        
      298. 
      
        
    298. 
          
          
          
        
      299. 
      
        
    299. 
          1
          
                  a = VersionManager.concat_time("a", t)
        
      300. 
      
        
    300. 
          1
          
                  b = VersionManager.concat_time("b", t)
        
      301. 
      
        
    301. 
          1
          
                  c = VersionManager.concat_time("c", t)
        
      302. 
      
        
    302. 
          
          
                  
        
      303. 
      
        
    303. 
          1
          
                  assert new_c == "#{a} 1 true, #{b} 2 false, #{c} 1-2 true"
        
      304. 
      
        
    304. 
          
          
          
        
      305. 
      
        
    305. 
          
          
              end
        
      306. 
      
        
    306. 
          
          
          
        
      307. 
      
        
    307. 
          1
          
              test "remove_suffix_from_content" do 
        
      308. 
      
        
    308. 
          
          
          
        
      309. 
      
        
    309. 
          1
          
                  t = Time.now.to_s
        
      310. 
      
        
    310. 
          1
          
                  a = VersionManager.concat_time("a", t)
        
      311. 
      
        
    311. 
          1
          
                  b = VersionManager.concat_time("b", t)
        
      312. 
      
        
    312. 
          1
          
                  c = VersionManager.concat_time("c", t)
        
      313. 
      
        
    313. 
          
          
          
        
      314. 
      
        
    314. 
          1
          
                  assert = VersionManager.remove_suffix_from_content(nil) == ""
        
      315. 
      
        
    315. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.remove_suffix_from_content([]) == ""
        
      316. 
      
        
    316. 
          
          
          
        
      317. 
      
        
    317. 
          1
          
                  ca = [["#{a}", "1", true], ["#{b}", "2", false], ["#{c}", "1-2", true]]
        
      318. 
      
        
    318. 
          
          
          
        
      319. 
      
        
    319. 
          1
          
                  new_c = VersionManager.remove_suffix_from_content(ca)
        
      320. 
      
        
    320. 
          
          
          
        
      321. 
      
        
    321. 
          1
          
                  assert new_c == "a 1 true, b 2 false, c 1-2 true"
        
      322. 
      
        
    322. 
          
          
          
        
      323. 
      
        
    323. 
          
          
              end
        
      324. 
      
        
    324. 
          
          
          
        
      325. 
      
        
    325. 
          1
          
              test "archive_version_params" do
        
      326. 
      
        
    326. 
          
          
          
        
      327. 
      
        
    327. 
          1
          
                  eo = default_ensemble("s")
        
      328. 
      
        
    328. 
          1
          
                  archive_params = VersionManager.archive_version_params(eo)
        
      329. 
      
        
    329. 
          
          
          
        
      330. 
      
        
    330. 
          1
          
                  partial_compaire(eo, archive_params)
        
      331. 
      
        
    331. 
          
          
          
        
      332. 
      
        
    332. 
          1
          
                  s = archive_params[:sigles][0]
        
      333. 
      
        
    333. 
          1
          
                  assert s.index("_(")!=nil
        
      334. 
      
        
    334. 
          1
          
                  assert s.index(")")!=nil
        
      335. 
      
        
    335. 
          1
          
                  assert s.index(Date.today.year.to_s)!=nil
        
      336. 
      
        
    336. 
          1
          
                  assert s.index(Date.today.month.to_s)!=nil
        
      337. 
      
        
    337. 
          1
          
                  assert s.index(Date.today.day.to_s)!=nil
        
      338. 
      
        
    338. 
          1
          
                  assert archive_params[:status] == "archive"
        
      339. 
      
        
    339. 
          
          
          
        
      340. 
      
        
    340. 
          1
          
                  eo.sigles = "ABC_(Sat Jan 26 11:14:02 +0100 2013)"
        
      341. 
      
        
    341. 
          1
          
                  archive_params = VersionManager.archive_version_params(eo)
        
      342. 
      
        
    342. 
          
          
          
        
      343. 
      
        
    343. 
          1
          
                  s = archive_params[:sigles][0]
        
      344. 
      
        
    344. 
          1
          
                  assert s.index("_(")!=nil
        
      345. 
      
        
    345. 
          1
          
                  assert s.index(")")!=nil
        
      346. 
      
        
    346. 
          1
          
                  assert s.index(Date.today.year.to_s)!=nil
        
      347. 
      
        
    347. 
          1
          
                  assert s.index(Date.today.month.to_s)!=nil
        
      348. 
      
        
    348. 
          1
          
                  assert s.index(Date.today.day.to_s)!=nil
        
      349. 
      
        
    349. 
          
          
          
        
      350. 
      
        
    350. 
          
          
              end
        
      351. 
      
        
    351. 
          
          
          
        
      352. 
      
        
    352. 
          1
          
              test "future_version_params" do
        
      353. 
      
        
    353. 
          
          
          
        
      354. 
      
        
    354. 
          1
          
                  eo = default_ensemble("s")
        
      355. 
      
        
    355. 
          1
          
                  future_params = VersionManager.future_version_params(eo)
        
      356. 
      
        
    356. 
          
          
          
        
      357. 
      
        
    357. 
          1
          
                  partial_compaire(eo, future_params)
        
      358. 
      
        
    358. 
          
          
          
        
      359. 
      
        
    359. 
          1
          
                  assert future_params[:sigles][0] == VersionManager.concat_validite(eo.sigles_array()[0], eo.validite)
        
      360. 
      
        
    360. 
          1
          
                  assert future_params[:status] == "future"
        
      361. 
      
        
    361. 
          
          
          
        
      362. 
      
        
    362. 
          1
          
                  eo.sigles = "ABC_(Sat Jan 26 11:14:02 +0100 2013)"
        
      363. 
      
        
    363. 
          1
          
                  future_params = VersionManager.future_version_params(eo)
        
      364. 
      
        
    364. 
          1
          
                  assert future_params[:sigles][0] == VersionManager.concat_validite("ABC", eo.validite)
        
      365. 
      
        
    365. 
          
          
          
        
      366. 
      
        
    366. 
          
          
              end
        
      367.

      368. 
      
        
    368. 
          1
          
              test "actuel_version_params" do
        
      369. 
      
        
    369. 
          
          
          
        
      370. 
      
        
    370. 
          1
          
                  eo = default_ensemble("s")
        
      371. 
      
        
    371. 
          1
          
                  eo.contenu = "a_(3000) 1 false, b 1 false"
        
      372. 
      
        
    372. 
          1
          
                  actuel_params = VersionManager.actuel_version_params(eo)
        
      373. 
      
        
    373. 
          
          
          
        
      374. 
      
        
    374. 
          1
          
                  partial_compaire(eo, actuel_params)
        
      375. 
      
        
    375. 
          
          
          
        
      376. 
      
        
    376. 
          1
          
                  assert eo.sigles_array == actuel_params[:sigles]
        
      377. 
      
        
    377. 
          1
          
                  assert actuel_params[:status] == "actuel"
        
      378. 
      
        
    378. 
          1
          
                  assert actuel_params[:contenu] == "a 1 false, b 1 false"
        
      379. 
      
        
    379. 
          
          
          
        
      380. 
      
        
    380. 
          1
          
                  eo.sigles = "ABC_(Sat Jan 26 11:14:02 +0100 2013)"
        
      381. 
      
        
    381. 
          1
          
                  actuel_params = VersionManager.actuel_version_params(eo)
        
      382. 
      
        
    382. 
          1
          
                  assert actuel_params[:sigles] == ["ABC"]
        
      383. 
      
        
    383. 
          
          
          
        
      384. 
      
        
    384. 
          
          
              end
        
      385.

    386. 
          1
          
              test "has_suffix" do
        
      387. 
      
        
    387. 
          
          
          
        
      388. 
      
        
    388. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.has_suffix?("abcd_(abc)")
        
      389. 
      
        
    389. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.has_suffix?("abcd_()")
        
      390. 
      
        
    390. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.has_suffix?(nil)
        
      391. 
      
        
    391. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.has_suffix?("abcd")
        
      392. 
      
        
    392. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.has_suffix?("abcd_")
        
      393. 
      
        
    393. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.has_suffix?("abcd_(")
        
      394. 
      
        
    394. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.has_suffix?("abcd_)")
        
      395. 
      
        
    395. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.has_suffix?("abcd_abc)")
        
      396. 
      
        
    396. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.has_suffix?("abcd_(abc")
        
      397. 
      
        
    397. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.has_suffix?("abcd(abc)")
        
      398. 
      
        
    398. 
          1
          
                  assert !VersionManager.has_suffix?("abcd_)abc(")
        
      399. 
      
        
    399. 
          
          
          
        
      400. 
      
        
    400. 
          
          
              end 
        
      401. 
      
        
    401. 
          
          
          
        
      402. 
      
        
    402. 
          1
          
              test "remove_suffix" do
        
      403. 
      
        
    403. 
          
          
          
        
      404. 
      
        
    404. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.remove_suffix("abcd_(abc)") == "abcd"
        
      405. 
      
        
    405. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.remove_suffix("abcd_()") == "abcd"
        
      406. 
      
        
    406. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.remove_suffix("abcd_(abc))") == "abcd"
        
      407. 
      
        
    407. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.remove_suffix("abcd_((abc)") == "abcd"
        
      408. 
      
        
    408. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.remove_suffix("abcd_(_(abc)") == "abcd"
        
      409. 
      
        
    409. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.remove_suffix("abcd_(_(abc))") == "abcd"
        
      410. 
      
        
    410. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.remove_suffix("abcd") == "abcd"
        
      411. 
      
        
    411. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.remove_suffix("abcd_") == "abcd_"
        
      412. 
      
        
    412. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.remove_suffix("abcd(") == "abcd("
        
      413. 
      
        
    413. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.remove_suffix("abcd)") == "abcd)"
        
      414. 
      
        
    414. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.remove_suffix("abcd_(") == "abcd_("
        
      415. 
      
        
    415. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.remove_suffix("abcd_)") == "abcd_)"
        
      416. 
      
        
    416. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.remove_suffix("abcd_)(") == "abcd_)("
        
      417. 
      
        
    417. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.remove_suffix(nil) == nil
        
      418. 
      
        
    418. 
          
          
          
        
      419. 
      
        
    419. 
          
          
              end 
        
      420. 
      
        
    420. 
          
          
          
        
      421. 
      
        
    421. 
          1
          
              test "concat_time" do
        
      422. 
      
        
    422. 
          
          
          
        
      423. 
      
        
    423. 
          1
          
                  s = VersionManager.concat_time("abcd")
        
      424. 
      
        
    424. 
          1
          
                  assert s.index("_(")!=nil
        
      425. 
      
        
    425. 
          1
          
                  assert s.index(")")!=nil
        
      426. 
      
        
    426. 
          1
          
                  assert s.index(Date.today.year.to_s)!=nil
        
      427. 
      
        
    427. 
          1
          
                  assert s.index(Date.today.month.to_s)!=nil
        
      428. 
      
        
    428. 
          1
          
                  assert s.index(Date.today.day.to_s)!=nil
        
      429. 
      
        
    429. 
          
          
          
        
      430. 
      
        
    430. 
          1
          
                  s = VersionManager.concat_time(nil)
        
      431. 
      
        
    431. 
          1
          
                  assert s.index("_(")!=nil
        
      432. 
      
        
    432. 
          1
          
                  assert s.index(")")!=nil
        
      433. 
      
        
    433. 
          1
          
                  assert s.index(Date.today.year.to_s)!=nil
        
      434. 
      
        
    434. 
          1
          
                  assert s.index(Date.today.month.to_s)!=nil
        
      435. 
      
        
    435. 
          1
          
                  assert s.index(Date.today.day.to_s)!=nil
        
      436. 
      
        
    436. 
          
          
          
        
      437. 
      
        
    437. 
          
          
              end
        
      438. 
      
        
    438. 
          
          
          
        
      439.

          1
          
              test "concat_validite " do
        
      440. 
      
        
    440. 
          
          
          
        
      441. 
      
        
    441. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.concat_validite("abcd",2011) == "abcd_(2011)"
        
      442. 
      
        
    442. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.concat_validite("",2012) == "_(2012)"
        
      443. 
      
        
    443. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.concat_validite(nil,2013) == "_(2013)"
        
      444. 
      
        
    444. 
          
          
              
        
      445. 
      
        
    445. 
          
          
              end
        
      446. 
      
        
    446. 
          
          
          
        
      447. 
      
        
    447. 
          1
          
              test "params_according_to_validity" do
        
      448. 
      
        
    448. 
          
          
          
        
      449. 
      
        
    449. 
          1
          
                  e = default_ensemble("e")
        
      450. 
      
        
    450. 
          
          
          
        
      451. 
      
        
    451. 
          1
          
                  e.validite = Time.now.year - 2
        
      452. 
      
        
    452. 
          1
          
                  params = VersionManager.params_according_to_validity(e.extract_params)
        
      453. 
      
        
    453. 
          1
          
                  assert params[:status] == "actuel"
        
      454. 
      
        
    454. 
          
          
                  
        
      455. 
      
        
    455. 
          1
          
                  e.validite = Time.now.year + 2
        
      456. 
      
        
    456. 
          1
          
                  params = VersionManager.params_according_to_validity(e.extract_params)
        
      457. 
      
        
    457. 
          1
          
                  assert params[:status] == "future"
        
      458. 
      
        
    458. 
          
          
          
        
      459. 
      
        
    459. 
          
          
              end
        
      460. 
      
        
    460. 
          
          
          
        
      461. 
      
        
    461. 
          1
          
              test "create_module" do
        
      462. 
      
        
    462. 
          
          
          
        
      463. 
      
        
    463. 
          1
          
                  c = default_cours("c")
        
      464. 
      
        
    464. 
          1
          
                  e = default_ensemble("e")
        
      465. 
      
        
    465. 
          
          
          
        
      466. 
      
        
    466. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.create_module(c.extract_params).kind_of?(CoursObject)
        
      467. 
      
        
    467. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.create_module(e.extract_params).kind_of?(EnsembleObject)
        
      468. 
      
        
    468. 
          1
          
                  assert VersionManager.create_module(nil) == nil
        
      469. 
      
        
    469. 
          
          
          
        
      470. 
      
        
    470. 
          
          
              end
        
      471.

          end
        
      473.

    test/unit/objects/contrainte_object_test.rb

    100.0 % covered

    108 relevant lines. 108 lines covered and 0 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          1
          
          require 'test_helper'
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
          
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          1
          
          class ContrainteObjectTest < ActiveSupport::TestCase
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
          
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          1
          
              def compaire(c1, c2)
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
          
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          1
          
                  assert c1.target == c2.target
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          1
          
                  assert c1.cond == c2.cond
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          1
          
                  assert c1.effet == c2.effet
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
          
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
              end
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
          
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          1
          
              def create_contrainte(target, cond, effet)
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
          
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          6
          
                  param = {}
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          6
          
                  param[:target] = target
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          6
          
                  param[:cond] = cond
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          6
          
                  param[:effet] = effet
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
          
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          6
          
                  return ContrainteObject.new(param)
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
          
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
              end
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
          
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          1
          
              test "format_expr" do
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
          
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
                  c = create_contrainte(" * ", "A&(B       &C)|(!D||(    A&    &(B)))", "E(A)&(T  (B)&C(C)  |(!D||(A&&(B)))")
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
          
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                  # Vrification que les expressions contiennent 1 espace entre chaque symbole
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1
          
                  assert c.target == "*"
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1
          
                  assert c.cond == "A & ( B & C ) | ( ! D || ( A && ( B ) ) )"
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
                  assert c.effet == "E ( A ) & ( T ( B ) & C ( C ) | ( ! D || ( A && ( B ) ) )"
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
          
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
              end
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          1
          
              test "create/load contrainte" do
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
          
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1
          
                  eo = default_ensemble("s")
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          1
          
                  assert eo.save
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          1
          
                  eo2 = default_ensemble("s2")
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          1
          
                  assert eo2.save
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
          
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1
          
                  c = create_contrainte("*","s","s2")
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          1
          
                  assert !c.persisted?
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          1
          
                  id = c.save
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          1
          
                  assert c.persisted?
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          1
          
                  assert id > 0
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
          
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          1
          
                  c2 = ContrainteObject.new()
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          1
          
                  assert !c2.persisted?
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          1
          
                  assert c2.load(id)
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          1
          
                  assert c2.persisted?
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
          
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          1
          
                  assert c2.target == "*"
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          1
          
                  assert c2.cond == "s"
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          1
          
                  assert c2.effet == "s2"
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
          
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          1
          
                  compaire(c, c2)
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
          
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
              end
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
          
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          1
          
              test "update_params" do 
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
          
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          1
          
                  c = create_contrainte("*","s","s2")
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
          
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          1
          
                  assert c.target == "*"
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          1
          
                  assert c.cond == "s"
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          1
          
                  assert c.effet == "s2"
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
          
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          1
          
                  params = {}
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          1
          
                  params[:target] = "s"
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          1
          
                  params[:cond] = "s2"
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          1
          
                  params[:effet] = "s3"
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
          
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          1
          
                  c.update_params(params)
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
          
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          1
          
                  assert c.target == "s"
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          1
          
                  assert c.cond == "s2"
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          1
          
                  assert c.effet == "s3"
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
          
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
              end
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
          
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          1
          
              test "update contrainte" do
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
          
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          1
          
                  eo = default_ensemble("s")
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          1
          
                  assert eo.save
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
          
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          1
          
                  eo2 = default_ensemble("s2")
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          1
          
                  assert eo2.save
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
          
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          1
          
                  c = create_contrainte("*","s","s2")
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          1
          
                  id = c.save
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          1
          
                  assert id > 0
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
          
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          1
          
                  c2 = ContrainteObject.new()
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          1
          
                  assert c2.load(id)
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
          
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          1
          
                  param2 = {}
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          1
          
                  param2[:target] = "*"
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          1
          
                  param2[:cond] = "s10"
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          1
          
                  param2[:effet] = "s2"
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
          
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          1
          
                  assert !c2.update(param2)
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
          
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          1
          
                  assert c2.target == "*"
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          1
          
                  assert c2.cond == "s"
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          1
          
                  assert c2.effet == "s2"
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
          
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          1
          
                  param2[:cond] = "s2"
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          1
          
                  param2[:effet] = "s"
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
          
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          1
          
                  assert c2.update(param2)
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
          
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          1
          
                  c3 = ContrainteObject.new()
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
          
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          1
          
                  assert c3.load(id)
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          1
          
                  assert c3.target == "*"
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          1
          
                  assert c3.cond == "s2"
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          1
          
                  assert c3.effet == "s"
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
          
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
              end
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
          
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          1
          
              test "destroy contrainte" do
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
          
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          1
          
                  eo = default_ensemble("s")
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          1
          
                  assert eo.save
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
          
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          1
          
                  eo2 = default_ensemble("s2")
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          1
          
                  assert eo2.save
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
          
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          1
          
                  param = {}
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          1
          
                  param[:target] = "*"
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          1
          
                  param[:cond] = "s"
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          1
          
                  param[:effet] = "s2"
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
          
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          1
          
                  c = ContrainteObject.new(param)
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
          
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          1
          
                  Contrainte.all.length == 0
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
          
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          1
          
                  id = c.save
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          1
          
                  assert id > 0
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
          
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          1
          
                  Contrainte.all.length == 1
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
          
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          1
          
                  c2 = ContrainteObject.new()
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          1
          
                  c2.load(id)
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
          
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          1
          
                  assert c2.persisted?
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
          
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          1
          
                  c2.destroy
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
          
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          1
          
                  assert !c2.persisted?
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
          
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          1
          
                  Contrainte.all.length == 0
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
          
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
              end
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
          
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          1
          
              test "load_all" do
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
          
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          1
          
                  eo = default_ensemble("s")
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          1
          
                  assert eo.save
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
          
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          1
          
                  eo2 = default_ensemble("s2")
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          1
          
                  assert eo2.save
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
          
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          1
          
                  c = create_contrainte("*","s","s2")
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          1
          
                  c2 = create_contrainte("*","s2","s")
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
          
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          1
          
                  assert c.save > 0
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          1
          
                  assert c2.save > 0
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
          
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          1
          
                  list = ContrainteObject.load_all()
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          1
          
                  assert list.size == 2
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          1
          
                  assert list[0].cond == "s" || list[0].cond == "s2"
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          1
          
                  assert list[1].cond == "s" || list[1].cond == "s2"
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          1
          
                  assert list[0].cond != list[1].cond
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
          
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
              end
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
          
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
          end
        
      181.

          class CoursObjectTest < ActiveSupport::TestCase
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
          
        
      7.

          1
          
              test "create/load cours" do
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
          
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          1
          
                  param = {}
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMax] = 5
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          1
          
                  param[:intitule] = "intitule"
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          1
          
                  param[:langue] = "fr"
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          1
          
                  param[:sigles] = ["s1","s2","s3"]
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          1
          
                  param[:dureeCours] = 27.75
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          1
          
                  param[:dureeTP] = 30
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          1
          
                  param[:quadri] = 1
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          1
          
                  param[:dptCharge] = "INGI"
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          1
          
                  param[:professeur] = "professeur"
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          1
          
                  param[:commentaire] = "commentaire"
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          1
          
                  param[:validite] = 2012
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          1
          
                  param[:import_commentaire] = "import commentaire"
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
                  param[:status] = "actuel"
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
          
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          1
          
                  co = CoursObject.new(param)
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
                  assert !co.persisted?
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
                  id = co.save
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1
          
                  assert (id>=0)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
                  assert co.persisted?
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1
          
                  co2 =  CoursObject.new()
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
                  assert !co2.persisted?
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
                  assert co2.load(id)
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
                  assert co2.persisted?
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          1
          
                  assert (co.creditsMax == co2.creditsMax) 
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          1
          
                  assert (co2.creditsMax == 5)
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
          
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          1
          
                  assert (co.creditsMin == co2.creditsMin) 
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          1
          
                  assert (co2.creditsMin == 5)
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
          
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          1
          
                  assert (co.intitule == co2.intitule) 
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          1
          
                  assert (co2.intitule == "intitule")
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
          
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          1
          
                  assert (co.langue == co2.langue)  
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          1
          
                  assert (co2.langue == "fr")
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
          
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          1
          
                  assert (co.sigles == co2.sigles) 
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          1
          
                  assert (co2.sigles_array == ["s1","s2","s3"])
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
          
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          1
          
                  assert (co.dureeCours == co2.dureeCours) 
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          1
          
                  assert (co2.dureeCours == 27.75)
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
          
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          1
          
                  assert (co.dureeTP == co2.dureeTP) 
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          1
          
                  assert (co2.dureeTP == 30)
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
          
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          1
          
                  assert (co.quadri == co2.quadri) 
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          1
          
                  assert (co2.quadri == 1)
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
          
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          1
          
                  assert (co.dptCharge == co2.dptCharge) 
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          1
          
                  assert (co2.dptCharge == "INGI")
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
          
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          1
          
                  assert (co.professeur == co2.professeur) 
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          1
          
                  assert (co2.professeur == "professeur")
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
          
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          1
          
                  assert (co.commentaire == co2.commentaire) 
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          1
          
                  assert (co2.commentaire == "commentaire")
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
          
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          1
          
                  assert (co.validite == co2.validite) 
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          1
          
                  assert (co2.validite == 2012)
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
          
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          1
          
                  assert (co.import_commentaire == co2.import_commentaire) 
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          1
          
                  assert (co2.import_commentaire == "import commentaire")
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
          
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          1
          
                  assert (co.status == co2.status) 
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          1
          
                  assert (co2.status == "actuel")
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
          
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
              end
        
      78.

              def compare(c1, c2)
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
          
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                  # Ne compare pas les sigles car ils ne peuvent jamais tre les mmes
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          9
          
                  assert (c1.creditsMax == c2.creditsMax) 
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          9
          
                  assert (c1.creditsMin == c2.creditsMin) 
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          9
          
                  assert (c1.intitule == c2.intitule) 
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          9
          
                  assert (c1.langue == c2.langue)  
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          9
          
                  assert (c1.dureeCours == c2.dureeCours) 
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          9
          
                  assert (c1.dureeTP == c2.dureeTP) 
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          9
          
                  assert (c1.quadri == c2.quadri) 
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          9
          
                  assert (c1.dptCharge == c2.dptCharge) 
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          9
          
                  assert (c1.professeur == c2.professeur) 
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          9
          
                  assert (c1.commentaire == c2.commentaire) 
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          9
          
                  assert (c1.validite == c2.validite) 
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          9
          
                  assert (c1.import_commentaire == c2.import_commentaire) 
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          9
          
                  assert (c1.status == c2.status) 
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
          
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
              end
        
      97.

          1
          
              test "create/load cours with defaults values" do
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
          
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          1
          
                  param = {}
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMax] = 5
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMin] = 5
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          1
          
                  param[:intitule] = nil
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          1
          
                  param[:langue] = "fr-angl"
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          1
          
                  param[:sigles] = ["s1","s2","s3"]
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          1
          
                  param[:dureeCours] = 27.75
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          1
          
                  param[:dureeTP] = 30
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          1
          
                  param[:quadri] = 1
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          1
          
                  param[:dptCharge] = nil
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          1
          
                  param[:professeur] = nil
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          1
          
                  param[:commentaire] = nil
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          1
          
                  param[:validite] = nil
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          1
          
                  param[:import_commentaire] = nil
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          1
          
                  param[:status] = "actuel"
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
          
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          1
          
                  c1 = CoursObject.new(param)
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
          
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          1
          
                  param2 = {}
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          1
          
                  param2[:creditsMax] = 5
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          1
          
                  param2[:creditsMin] = 5
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          1
          
                  param2[:sigles] = ["s4","s5","s6"]
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          1
          
                  param2[:dureeCours] = 27.75
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          1
          
                  param2[:dureeTP] = 30
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          1
          
                  param2[:quadri] = 1
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
          
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          1
          
                  c2 = CoursObject.new(param2)
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
          
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          1
          
                  compare(c1,c2)
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
          
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          1
          
                  id1 = c1.save
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          1
          
                  assert (id1>=0)
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
          
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          1
          
                  id2 = c2.save
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          1
          
                  assert (id2>=0)
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
          
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          1
          
                  new_c1 = CoursObject.new
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          1
          
                  assert (new_c1.load(id1) == true)
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
          
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          1
          
                  new_c2 = CoursObject.new
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          1
          
                  assert (new_c2.load(id2) == true)
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
          
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          1
          
                  compare(c1,new_c1)
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          1
          
                  compare(c2,new_c2)
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          1
          
                  compare(new_c1,new_c2)
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
          
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
              end
        
      147.
