      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          1
          
              test "extract_params" do
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
          
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          1
          
                  params = {}
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          1
          
                  params[:creditsMax] = 6
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          1
          
                  params[:creditsMin] = 5
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          1
          
                  params[:intitule] = "intitule"
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          1
          
                  params[:langue] = "fr"
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          1
          
                  params[:sigles] = ["s1","s2","s3"]
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          1
          
                  params[:dureeCours] = 27.75
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          1
          
                  params[:dureeTP] = 30
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          1
          
                  params[:quadri] = 1
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          1
          
                  params[:dptCharge] = "INGI"
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          1
          
                  params[:professeur] = "professeur"
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          1
          
                  params[:commentaire] = "commentaire"
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          1
          
                  params[:validite] = 2012
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          1
          
                  params[:import_commentaire] = "import commentaire"
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          1
          
                  params[:status] = "actuel"
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
          
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          1
          
                  c = CoursObject.new(params)
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
          
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          1
          
                  ep = c.extract_params()
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
          
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:creditsMax] == params[:creditsMax]
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:creditsMin] == params[:creditsMin]
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:intitule] == params[:intitule]
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:langue] == params[:langue]
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:sigles] == params[:sigles]
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:dureeCours] == params[:dureeCours]
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:dureeTP] == params[:dureeTP]
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:quadri] == params[:quadri]
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:mtype] == "cours"
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:dptCharge] == params[:dptCharge]
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:professeur] == params[:professeur]
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:commentaire] == params[:commentaire]
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:validite] == params[:validite]
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:import_commentaire] == params[:import_commentaire]
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:status] == params[:status]
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
          
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
              end
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
          
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          1
          
              test "update_params" do
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
          
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          1
          
                  params = {}
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          1
          
                  params[:creditsMax] = 0
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          1
          
                  params[:creditsMin] = 0
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          1
          
                  params[:intitule] = ""
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          1
          
                  params[:langue] = ""
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          1
          
                  params[:sigles] = ""
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          1
          
                  params[:dureeCours] = 0
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          1
          
                  params[:dureeTP] = 0
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          1
          
                  params[:quadri] = 0
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          1
          
                  params[:dptCharge] = ""
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          1
          
                  params[:professeur] = ""
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          1
          
                  params[:commentaire] = ""
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          1
          
                  params[:validite] = 0
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          1
          
                  params[:import_commentaire] = ""
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          1
          
                  params[:status] = ""
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
          
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          1
          
                  c = CoursObject.new(params)
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
          
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          1
          
                  params = {}
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          1
          
                  params[:creditsMax] = 6
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          1
          
                  params[:creditsMin] = 5
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          1
          
                  params[:intitule] = "intitule"
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          1
          
                  params[:langue] = "fr"
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          1
          
                  params[:sigles] = ["s1","s2","s3"]
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          1
          
                  params[:dureeCours] = 27.75
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          1
          
                  params[:dureeTP] = 30
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          1
          
                  params[:quadri] = 1
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          1
          
                  params[:dptCharge] = "INGI"
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          1
          
                  params[:professeur] = "professeur"
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          1
          
                  params[:commentaire] = "commentaire"
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          1
          
                  params[:validite] = 2012
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          1
          
                  params[:import_commentaire] = "import commentaire"
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          1
          
                  params[:status] = "actuel"
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          
          
          
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          1
          
                  c.update_params(params)
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          
          
          
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          1
          
                  c.extract_params == params
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          
          
          
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          
          
              end
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          
          
          
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          1
          
              test "update cours" do
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          
          
          
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          1
          
                  param = {}
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMax] = 6
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMin] = 5
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          1
          
                  param[:intitule] = "intitule"
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          1
          
                  param[:langue] = "fr"
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          1
          
                  param[:sigles] = ["s1","s2","s3"]
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          1
          
                  param[:dureeCours] = 27.75
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          1
          
                  param[:dureeTP] = 30
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          1
          
                  param[:quadri] = 1
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          1
          
                  param[:dptCharge] = "INGI"
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          1
          
                  param[:professeur] = "professeur"
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          1
          
                  param[:commentaire] = "commentaire"
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          1
          
                  param[:validite] = 2012
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          1
          
                  param[:import_commentaire] = "import commentaire"
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          1
          
                  param[:status] = "actuel"
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          
          
          
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          1
          
                  param2 = {}   
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          1
          
                  param2[:creditsMax] = 4
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          1
          
                  param2[:creditsMin] = 4
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          1
          
                  param2[:intitule] = "intitule2"
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          1
          
                  param2[:langue] = "angl"
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          1
          
                  param2[:sigles] = ["s4"]
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          1
          
                  param2[:dureeCours] = 15
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          1
          
                  param2[:dureeTP] = 15
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          1
          
                  param2[:quadri] = 2
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          1
          
                  param2[:dptCharge] = "INGI2"
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          1
          
                  param2[:professeur] = "professeur2"
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          1
          
                  param2[:commentaire] = "commentaire2"
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          1
          
                  param2[:validite] = 2013
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          1
          
                  param2[:import_commentaire] = "import commentaire2"
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          1
          
                  param2[:status] = "archive"
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          
          
          
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          1
          
                  c1 = CoursObject.new(param)
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          1
          
                  id1 = c1.save
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          1
          
                  assert (id1>=0)
        
      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          
          
          
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          1
          
                  c2 = CoursObject.new(param2)
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          1
          
                  id2 = c2.save
        
      270. 
      
        
    270. 
          1
          
                  assert (id2>=0)
        
      271. 
      
        
    271. 
          
          
          
        
      272. 
      
        
    272. 
          1
          
                  new_c1 = CoursObject.new
        
      273. 
      
        
    273. 
          1
          
                  assert (new_c1.load(id1) == true)
        
      274. 
      
        
    274. 
          
          
          
        
      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          1
          
                  param2[:sigles] = ["s5"] # Autrement l'update ne peut se faire car s4 est dj attribu
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          
          
          
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          1
          
                  assert new_c1.update(param2)
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          
          
          
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          1
          
                  new_c2 = CoursObject.new
        
      280. 
      
        
    280. 
          1
          
                  assert (new_c2.load(id2) == true)
        
      281. 
      
        
    281. 
          
          
          
        
      282. 
      
        
    282. 
          
          
                  # Ne compare pas les sigles car ils ne peuvent pas tre les mmes dans ce cas
        
      283. 
      
        
    283. 
          1
          
                  compare(new_c1,new_c2)
        
      284. 
      
        
    284. 
          
          
          
        
      285. 
      
        
    285. 
          
          
              end
        
      286. 
      
        
    286. 
          
          
          
        
      287. 
      
        
    287. 
          1
          
              test "destroy cours" do
        
      288. 
      
        
    288. 
          
          
          
        
      289. 
      
        
    289. 
          1
          
                  param = {}
        
      290. 
      
        
    290. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMax] = 4
        
      291. 
      
        
    291. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMin] = 4
        
      292. 
      
        
    292. 
          1
          
                  param[:sigles] = ["s1","s2"]
        
      293. 
      
        
    293. 
          1
          
                  param[:dureeCours] = 28.75
        
      294. 
      
        
    294. 
          1
          
                  param[:dureeTP] = 28.75
        
      295. 
      
        
    295. 
          1
          
                  param[:quadri] = 1
        
      296. 
      
        
    296. 
          
          
          
        
      297. 
      
        
    297. 
          1
          
                  pml = Pmodule.all.length
        
      298. 
      
        
    298. 
          1
          
                  sl = Sigle.all.length
        
      299. 
      
        
    299. 
          1
          
                  ccl = CoursContenu.all.length
        
      300. 
      
        
    300. 
          
          
          
        
      301. 
      
        
    301. 
          1
          
                  c = CoursObject.new(param)
        
      302. 
      
        
    302. 
          1
          
                  assert !c.persisted?    
        
      303. 
      
        
    303. 
          1
          
                  assert c.save > 0
        
      304. 
      
        
    304. 
          1
          
                  assert c.persisted?    
        
      305. 
      
        
    305. 
          1
          
                  assert c.destroy
        
      306. 
      
        
    306. 
          1
          
                  assert !c.persisted?    
        
      307. 
      
        
    307. 
          
          
          
        
      308. 
      
        
    308. 
          1
          
                  assert Pmodule.all.length == pml
        
      309. 
      
        
    309. 
          1
          
                  assert Sigle.all.length == sl
        
      310. 
      
        
    310. 
          1
          
                  assert CoursContenu.all.length == ccl
        
      311. 
      
        
    311. 
          
          
          
        
      312. 
      
        
    312. 
          
          
              end
        
      313. 
      
        
    313. 
          
          
          
        
      314. 
      
        
    314. 
          1
          
              def check_not_persisted(param)
        
      315. 
      
        
    315. 
          
          
          
        
      316. 
      
        
    316. 
          4
          
                  pml = Pmodule.all.length
        
      317. 
      
        
    317. 
          4
          
                  sl = Sigle.all.length
        
      318. 
      
        
    318. 
          4
          
                  ccl = CoursContenu.all.length
        
      319. 
      
        
    319. 
          
          
          
        
      320. 
      
        
    320. 
          4
          
                  c = CoursObject.new(param)
        
      321. 
      
        
    321. 
          4
          
                  id = c.save()
        
      322. 
      
        
    322. 
          
          
          
        
      323. 
      
        
    323. 
          4
          
                  assert (id<0)
        
      324. 
      
        
    324. 
          
          
          
        
      325. 
      
        
    325. 
          4
          
                  assert Pmodule.all.length == pml
        
      326. 
      
        
    326. 
          4
          
                  assert Sigle.all.length == sl
        
      327. 
      
        
    327. 
          4
          
                  assert CoursContenu.all.length == ccl
        
      328. 
      
        
    328. 
          
          
          
        
      329. 
      
        
    329. 
          
          
              end
        
      330. 
      
        
    330. 
          
          
          
        
      331. 
      
        
    331. 
          1
          
              test "transactions on save cours" do
        
      332. 
      
        
    332. 
          
          
          
        
      333. 
      
        
    333. 
          1
          
                  param = {}
        
      334. 
      
        
    334. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMax] = -1     # <= invalide
        
      335. 
      
        
    335. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMin] = -1     # <= invalide
        
      336. 
      
        
    336. 
          1
          
                  param[:sigles] = ["s1","s2"]
        
      337. 
      
        
    337. 
          1
          
                  param[:dureeCours] = 28.75
        
      338. 
      
        
    338. 
          1
          
                  param[:dureeTP] = 28.75
        
      339. 
      
        
    339. 
          1
          
                  param[:quadri] = 2
        
      340. 
      
        
    340. 
          
          
          
        
      341. 
      
        
    341. 
          1
          
                  check_not_persisted(param)
        
      342. 
      
        
    342. 
          
          
          
        
      343. 
      
        
    343. 
          1
          
                  param = {}
        
      344. 
      
        
    344. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMax] = 6
        
      345. 
      
        
    345. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMin] = 5
        
      346. 
      
        
    346. 
          1
          
                  param[:sigles] = ["s1"]
        
      347. 
      
        
    347. 
          1
          
                  param[:dureeCours] = -1     # <= invalide
        
      348. 
      
        
    348. 
          1
          
                  param[:dureeTP] = -1        # <= invalide
        
      349. 
      
        
    349. 
          1
          
                  param[:quadri] = 2
        
      350. 
      
        
    350. 
          
          
          
        
      351. 
      
        
    351. 
          1
          
                  check_not_persisted(param)
        
      352. 
      
        
    352. 
          
          
          
        
      353. 
      
        
    353. 
          1
          
                  param = {}
        
      354. 
      
        
    354. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMax] = 6
        
      355. 
      
        
    355. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMin] = 5
        
      356. 
      
        
    356. 
          1
          
                  param[:langue] = "angl"
        
      357. 
      
        
    357. 
          1
          
                  param[:sigles] = ["s1"] 
        
      358. 
      
        
    358. 
          1
          
                  param[:dureeCours] = 10
        
      359. 
      
        
    359. 
          1
          
                  param[:dureeTP] = 10
        
      360. 
      
        
    360. 
          1
          
                  param[:quadri] = 2
        
      361. 
      
        
    361. 
          1
          
                  param[:validite] = "-1" # <= invalide 
        
      362. 
      
        
    362. 
          
          
          
        
      363. 
      
        
    363. 
          1
          
                  check_not_persisted(param)
        
      364. 
      
        
    364. 
          
          
          
        
      365. 
      
        
    365. 
          1
          
                  param = {}
        
      366. 
      
        
    366. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMax] = 6
        
      367. 
      
        
    367. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMin] = 5
        
      368. 
      
        
    368. 
          1
          
                  param[:langue] = "angl"
        
      369. 
      
        
    369. 
          1
          
                  param[:sigles] = ["s1"] 
        
      370. 
      
        
    370. 
          1
          
                  param[:dureeCours] = 10
        
      371. 
      
        
    371. 
          1
          
                  param[:dureeTP] = 10
        
      372. 
      
        
    372. 
          1
          
                  param[:quadri] = 2
        
      373. 
      
        
    373. 
          1
          
                  param[:status] = "WRONG" # <= invalide 
        
      374. 
      
        
    374. 
          
          
          
        
      375. 
      
        
    375. 
          1
          
                  check_not_persisted(param)
        
      376. 
      
        
    376. 
          
          
          
        
      377. 
      
        
    377. 
          
          
              end
        
      378. 
      
        
    378. 
          
          
          
        
      379. 
      
        
    379. 
          1
          
              def check_not_changed(id, new_param)
        
      380. 
      
        
    380. 
          
          
          
        
      381. 
      
        
    381. 
          4
          
                  c = CoursObject.new()
        
      382. 
      
        
    382. 
          4
          
                  assert c.load(id)
        
      383. 
      
        
    383. 
          
          
          
        
      384. 
      
        
    384. 
          4
          
                  c2 = CoursObject.new()
        
      385. 
      
        
    385. 
          4
          
                  assert (c2.load(id))
        
      386. 
      
        
    386. 
          
          
          
        
      387. 
      
        
    387. 
          4
          
                  r = c2.update(new_param)
        
      388. 
      
        
    388. 
          
          
          
        
      389. 
      
        
    389. 
          4
          
                  assert (r==false)
        
      390. 
      
        
    390. 
          
          
          
        
      391. 
      
        
    391. 
          4
          
                  c2 = CoursObject.new()
        
      392. 
      
        
    392. 
          4
          
                  assert (c2.load(id)) 
        
      393. 
      
        
    393. 
          4
          
                  compare(c,c2)
        
      394. 
      
        
    394. 
          
          
          
        
      395. 
      
        
    395. 
          
          
              end
        
      396. 
      
        
    396. 
          
          
          
        
      397. 
      
        
    397. 
          1
          
              test "transactions on update cours" do
        
      398. 
      
        
    398. 
          
          
          
        
      399. 
      
        
    399. 
          1
          
                  param = {}
        
      400. 
      
        
    400. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMax] = 5
        
      401. 
      
        
    401. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMin] = 5 
        
      402. 
      
        
    402. 
          1
          
                  param[:langue] = "angl"
        
      403. 
      
        
    403. 
          1
          
                  param[:sigles] = ["s1","s2"] 
        
      404. 
      
        
    404. 
          1
          
                  param[:dureeCours] = 28.75
        
      405. 
      
        
    405. 
          1
          
                  param[:dureeTP] = 28.75
        
      406. 
      
        
    406. 
          1
          
                  param[:quadri] = 2
        
      407. 
      
        
    407. 
          1
          
                  param[:dptCharge] = "INGI"
        
      408. 
      
        
    408. 
          1
          
                  param[:commentaire] = "commentaire"
        
      409. 
      
        
    409. 
          
          
          
        
      410. 
      
        
    410. 
          1
          
                  c = CoursObject.new(param)
        
      411. 
      
        
    411. 
          1
          
                  id = c.save()
        
      412. 
      
        
    412. 
          1
          
                  assert (id>=0)
        
      413. 
      
        
    413. 
          
          
          
        
      414. 
      
        
    414. 
          1
          
                  param2 = {}
        
      415. 
      
        
    415. 
          1
          
                  param2[:creditsMax] = -1     # <= invalide
        
      416. 
      
        
    416. 
          1
          
                  param2[:creditsMin] = -1     # <= invalide
        
      417. 
      
        
    417. 
          1
          
                  param2[:langue] = "angl"
        
      418. 
      
        
    418. 
          1
          
                  param2[:sigles] = ["s3","s4"] 
        
      419. 
      
        
    419. 
          1
          
                  param2[:dureeCours] = 28.75
        
      420. 
      
        
    420. 
          1
          
                  param2[:dureeTP] = 28.75
        
      421. 
      
        
    421. 
          1
          
                  param2[:quadri] = 2
        
      422. 
      
        
    422. 
          1
          
                  param2[:dptCharge] = "INGI"
        
      423. 
      
        
    423. 
          1
          
                  param2[:commentaire] = "commentaire"
        
      424. 
      
        
    424. 
          
          
          
        
      425. 
      
        
    425. 
          1
          
                  check_not_changed(id, param2)
        
      426. 
      
        
    426. 
          
          
          
        
      427. 
      
        
    427. 
          1
          
                  param2 = {}
        
      428. 
      
        
    428. 
          1
          
                  param2[:creditsMax] = 6
        
      429. 
      
        
    429. 
          1
          
                  param2[:creditsMin] = 5
        
      430. 
      
        
    430. 
          1
          
                  param2[:langue] = "angl"
        
      431. 
      
        
    431. 
          1
          
                  param2[:sigles] = ["s5"]
        
      432. 
      
        
    432. 
          1
          
                  param2[:dureeCours] = -1     # <= invalide
        
      433. 
      
        
    433. 
          1
          
                  param2[:dureeTP] = -1        # <= invalide
        
      434. 
      
        
    434. 
          1
          
                  param2[:quadri] = 2
        
      435. 
      
        
    435. 
          1
          
                  param2[:dptCharge] = "INGI"
        
      436. 
      
        
    436. 
          1
          
                  param2[:commentaire] = "commentaire"
        
      437. 
      
        
    437. 
          
          
          
        
      438. 
      
        
    438. 
          1
          
                  check_not_changed(id, param2)
        
      439. 
      
        
    439.

    440.

              test "destroy cours but contrainte" do
        
      467. 
      
        
    467. 
          
          
          
        
      468. 
      
        
    468. 
          1
          
                  param = {}
        
      469. 
      
        
    469. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMax] = 4
        
      470. 
      
        
    470. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMin] = 4
        
      471. 
      
        
    471. 
          1
          
                  param[:sigles] = ["s1","s2"]
        
      472. 
      
        
    472. 
          1
          
                  param[:dureeCours] = 28.75
        
      473. 
      
        
    473. 
          1
          
                  param[:dureeTP] = 28.75
        
      474. 
      
        
    474. 
          1
          
                  param[:quadri] = 1
        
      475. 
      
        
    475. 
          
          
          
        
      476. 
      
        
    476. 
          1
          
                  param2 = {}
        
      477. 
      
        
    477. 
          1
          
                  param2[:creditsMax] = 4
        
      478. 
      
        
    478. 
          1
          
                  param2[:creditsMin] = 4
        
      479. 
      
        
    479. 
          1
          
                  param2[:sigles] = ["s3"]
        
      480. 
      
        
    480. 
          1
          
                  param2[:dureeCours] = 28.75
        
      481. 
      
        
    481. 
          1
          
                  param2[:dureeTP] = 28.75
        
      482. 
      
        
    482. 
          1
          
                  param2[:quadri] = 1
        
      483. 
      
        
    483. 
          
          
          
        
      484. 
      
        
    484. 
          1
          
                  c = CoursObject.new(param)      # sauve c
        
      485. 
      
        
    485. 
          1
          
                  assert (c.save>=0)
        
      486. 
      
        
    486. 
          1
          
                  c2 = CoursObject.new(param2)    # sauve c2
        
      487. 
      
        
    487. 
          1
          
                  assert (c2.save>=0)
        
      488. 
      
        
    488. 
          
          
          
        
      489. 
      
        
    489. 
          1
          
                  assert (c.destroy)
        
      490. 
      
        
    490. 
          1
          
                  assert (c.save>=0)
        
      491. 
      
        
    491. 
          
          
          
        
      492. 
      
        
    492. 
          1
          
                  param = {}
        
      493. 
      
        
    493. 
          1
          
                  param[:target] = "*"
        
      494. 
      
        
    494. 
          1
          
                  param[:cond] = "s1"
        
      495. 
      
        
    495. 
          1
          
                  param[:effet] = "s3"
        
      496. 
      
        
    496. 
          1
          
                  id = ContrainteObject.new(param).save # contrainte interdisant la suppression de c et test de suppression de c
        
      497. 
      
        
    497. 
          1
          
                  assert (!c.destroy)
        
      498. 
      
        
    498. 
          1
          
                  co = ContrainteObject.new()
        
      499. 
      
        
    499. 
          1
          
                  co.load(id)
        
      500. 
      
        
    500. 
          1
          
                  co.destroy                            # suppression de la contrainte et test de suppression de c
        
      501. 
      
        
    501. 
          1
          
                  assert (c.destroy)
        
      502. 
      
        
    502. 
          
          
          
        
      503. 
      
        
    503. 
          1
          
                  assert (c.save>=0)                    # resauvegarde de c 
        
      504. 
      
        
    504. 
          
          
          
        
      505. 
      
        
    505. 
          1
          
                  param = {}
        
      506. 
      
        
    506. 
          1
          
                  param[:target] = "*"
        
      507. 
      
        
    507. 
          1
          
                  param[:cond] = "s3"
        
      508. 
      
        
    508. 
          1
          
                  param[:effet] = "s2"
        
      509. 
      
        
    509. 
          1
          
                  id = ContrainteObject.new(param).save # contrainte interdisant la suppression de c et test de suppression de c
        
      510. 
      
        
    510. 
          1
          
                  assert (!c.destroy)
        
      511. 
      
        
    511. 
          1
          
                  co = ContrainteObject.new()
        
      512. 
      
        
    512. 
          1
          
                  co.load(id)
        
      513. 
      
        
    513. 
          1
          
                  co.destroy                            # suppression de la contrainte et test de suppression de c
        
      514. 
      
        
    514. 
          1
          
                  assert (c.destroy)
        
      515. 
      
        
    515. 
          
          
          
        
      516.

                  end

                  test "load_all" do
        
      519. 
      
        
    519. 
          
          
          
        
      520. 
      
        
    520. 
          1
          
                  co = default_cours("s")
        
      521. 
      
        
    521. 
          1
          
                  assert co.save
        
      522. 
      
        
    522. 
          
          
          
        
      523. 
      
        
    523. 
          1
          
                  co2 = default_cours("s2")
        
      524. 
      
        
    524. 
          1
          
                  assert co2.save
        
      525. 
      
        
    525. 
          
          
          
        
      526. 
      
        
    526. 
          1
          
                  list = CoursObject.load_all()
        
      527. 
      
        
    527. 
          1
          
                  assert list.size == 2
        
      528. 
      
        
    528. 
          1
          
                  assert list[0].sigles == "s" || list[0].sigles == "s2"
        
      529. 
      
        
    529. 
          1
          
                  assert list[1].sigles == "s" || list[1].sigles == "s2"
        
      530. 
      
        
    530. 
          1
          
                  assert list[0].sigles != list[1].sigles
        
      531. 
      
        
    531. 
          
          
          
        
      532. 
      
        
    532. 
          
          
              end

              def compaire(d1, d2)

          1

              test "create/load diplome" do
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
          
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          1
          
                  eo = default_ensemble("eo")
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          1
          
                  eid = eo.save()
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
          
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          1
          
                  params = {}
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
                  params[:cycle] = "master"
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          1
          
                  params[:sigle] = "SIGLE"
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          1
          
                  params[:facSigle] = "FACSIGLE"
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
                  params[:root_sigle] = "eo"
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
          
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1
          
                  d = DiplomeObject.new(params)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
                  assert !d.persisted?
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1
          
                  id = d.save
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1
          
                  assert id > 0
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
                  assert d.persisted?
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
          
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
                  d2 = DiplomeObject.new()
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          1
          
                  assert !d2.persisted?
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          1
          
                  assert d2.load(id)
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          1
          
                  assert d2.persisted?
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
          
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          1
          
                  assert d2.cycle == "master"
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          1
          
                  assert d2.sigle == "SIGLE"
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          1
          
                  assert d2.facSigle == "FACSIGLE"
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          1
          
                  assert d2.root_sigle == "eo"
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
          
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1
          
                  compaire(d, d2)
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
          
        
      45. 
      
        
    45.

              test "update_params" do
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
          
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          1
          
                  params = {}
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          1
          
                  params[:cycle] = "master"
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          1
          
                  params[:sigle] = "SIGLE"
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          1
          
                  params[:facSigle] = "FACSIGLE"
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          1
          
                  params[:root_sigle] = "eo"
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55.

          1

          1

          1

      63.

          1

          1

      66.

              test "destroy" do
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
          
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          1
          
                  eo = default_ensemble("eo")
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          1
          
                  eid = eo.save()
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
          
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          1
          
                  params = {}
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          1
          
                  params[:cycle] = "master"
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          1
          
                  params[:sigle] = "SIGLE"
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          1
          
                  params[:facSigle] = "FACSIGLE"
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          1
          
                  params[:root_sigle] = "eo"
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
          
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          1
          
                  size = Diplome.all.size
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
          
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          1
          
                  d = DiplomeObject.new(params)
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
          
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          1
          
                  assert !d.persisted?
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
          
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          1
          
                  id = d.save
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          1
          
                  assert id > 0
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
          
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          1
          
                  assert d.persisted?
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
          
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          1
          
                  assert d.destroy
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          1
          
                  assert Diplome.all.size == size
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
          
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          1
          
                  assert !d.persisted?
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
          
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
              end
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
          
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          1
          
              def try_saving(cycle, sigle, facSigle, root_sigle, result)
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
          
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          11
          
                  params = {}
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          11
          
                  params[:cycle] = cycle
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          11
          
                  params[:sigle] = sigle
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          11
          
                  params[:facSigle] = facSigle
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          11
          
                  params[:root_sigle] = root_sigle
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
          
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          11
          
                  d = DiplomeObject.new(params)
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          11
          
                  id = d.save
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          11
          
                  assert ((id > 0) == result)
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
          
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
              end
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
          
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          1
          
              test "diplome duplications" do
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
          
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          1
          
                  eo = default_ensemble("eo")
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          1
          
                  eid = eo.save()
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
          
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          1
          
                  try_saving("master", "sigle", "facSigle", "eo", true)
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
          
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          1
          
                  try_saving("master", "sigle", "facSigle", "eo", false)  # false car idem que ligne prcdente
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          1
          
                  try_saving("bac", "sigle", "facSigle", "eo", false)     # false car mme sigle que ligne prcdente
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
          
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          1
          
                  try_saving("bac", nil, "facSigle", "eo", false)   
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
          
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          1
          
                  try_saving("bac", "sigle2", "facSigle", "eo", true)
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          1
          
                  try_saving("master60", "sigle3", "facSigle", "eo", true)
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          1
          
                  try_saving("passerelle", "sigle4", "facSigle", "eo", true)
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
          
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          1
          
                  try_saving("wrong", "sigle5", "facSigle", "eo", false)
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          1
          
                  try_saving(nil, "sigle6", "facSigle", "eo", false)
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
          
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          1
          
                  try_saving("master", "sigle7", "facSigle", "eo2", false)
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          1
          
                  try_saving("master", "sigle8", "facSigle", nil, false)
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
          
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
              end
        
      186.

          1
          
              test "load_all" do
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
          
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          1
          
                  eo = default_ensemble("eo")
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          1
          
                  eo.save()
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
          
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          1
          
                  eo2 = default_ensemble("eo2")
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          1
          
                  eo2.save()
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
          
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          1
          
                  params = {}
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          1
          
                  params[:cycle] = "bac"
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          1
          
                  params[:sigle] = "s"
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          1
          
                  params[:facSigle] = "EPL"
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          1
          
                  params[:root_sigle] = "eo"
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
          
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          1
          
                  d = DiplomeObject.new(params)
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          1
          
                  assert d.save > 0
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
          
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          1
          
                  params[:sigle] = "s2"
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          1
          
                  params[:root_sigle] = "eo2"
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
          
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          1
          
                  d = DiplomeObject.new(params)
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          1
          
                  assert d.save > 0
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
          
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          1
          
                  list = DiplomeObject.load_all()
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          1
          
                  assert list.size == 2
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          1
          
                  assert list[0].sigle == "s" || list[0].sigle == "s2"
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          1
          
                  assert list[1].sigle == "s" || list[1].sigle == "s2"
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          1
          
                  assert list[0].sigle != list[1].sigle
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
          
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
              end
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          
          
          
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          1
          
              test "root" do
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          
          
          
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          1
          
                  params = {}
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          1
          
                  params[:cycle] = "bac"
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          1
          
                  params[:sigle] = "s"
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          1
          
                  params[:facSigle] = "EPL"
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          1
          
                  params[:root_sigle] = "eo"
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          
          
          
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          
          
                  # Racine inexistante
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          
          
          
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          1
          
                  d = DiplomeObject.new(params)
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          1
          
                  assert d.save <= 0
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          1
          
                  assert !d.report.empty?
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          
          
          
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          
          
                  # La racin est un cours
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          1
          
                  co = default_cours("co")
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          1
          
                  co.save
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          1
          
                  d = DiplomeObject.new(params)
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          1
          
                  assert d.save <= 0
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          1
          
                  assert !d.report.empty?
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          1
          
                  co.destroy
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          
          
          
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          
          
                  # La racine est correcte, un ensemble existant
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          
          
          
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          1
          
                  eo = default_ensemble("eo")
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          1
          
                  eo.save
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          1
          
                  d = DiplomeObject.new(params)
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          1
          
                  assert d.save > 0
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          1
          
                  assert d.report.empty?
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          
          
          
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          
          
              end
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          
          
             
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          
          
          end

          class EnsembleObjectTest < ActiveSupport::TestCase

          1
          
              test "create/load ensemble" do
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
          
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          1
          
                  c_param = {}
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
                  c_param[:creditsMax] = 6
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          1
          
                  c_param[:sigles] = ["s1","s2","s3"]
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          1
          
                  c_param[:dureeCours] = 27.75
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          1
          
                  c_param[:dureeTP] = 30
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
          
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          1
          
                  co = CoursObject.new(c_param)
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          1
          
                  c_id = co.save
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          1
          
                  assert(c_id>0)
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
          
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          1
          
                  c_param = {}
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          1
          
                  c_param[:creditsMax] = 6
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          1
          
                  c_param[:sigles] = ["s4"] 
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
                  c_param[:dureeCours] = 27.75
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          1
          
                  c_param[:dureeTP] = 30
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
                  co = CoursObject.new(c_param)
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
                  c_id2 = co.save
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1
          
                  assert(c_id2>0)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
          
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1
          
                  contenu =  "s1 1 false, s4 1-2 false"
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
          
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
                  param = {}
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMax] = 12
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMin] = 10
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          1
          
                  param[:langue] = "fr"
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          1
          
                  param[:sigles] = ["s5"] 
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          1
          
                  param[:dptCharge] = "INGI"
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1
          
                  param[:intitule] = "intitule"
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          1
          
                  param[:contenu] = contenu
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          1
          
                  param[:commentaire] = "commentaire"
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          1
          
                  param[:validite] = 2012
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          1
          
                  param[:import_commentaire] = "import commentaire"
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          1
          
                  param[:status] = "actuel"
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
          
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          1
          
                  eo = EnsembleObject.new(param)
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          1
          
                  assert !eo.persisted?
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          1
          
                  id = eo.save
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          1
          
                  assert (id>=0)
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          1
          
                  assert eo.persisted?
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
          
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          1
          
                  eo2 =  EnsembleObject.new()
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          1
          
                  assert !eo2.persisted?
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          1
          
                  assert eo2.load(id)
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          1
          
                  assert eo2.persisted?
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          1
          
                  assert (eo.creditsMax == eo2.creditsMax) 
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          1
          
                  assert (eo2.creditsMax == 12)
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
          
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          1
          
                  assert (eo.creditsMin == eo2.creditsMin) 
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          1
          
                  assert (eo2.creditsMin == 10)
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
          
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          1
          
                  assert (eo.intitule == eo2.intitule) 
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          1
          
                  assert (eo2.intitule == "intitule")
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
          
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          1
          
                  assert (eo.langue == eo2.langue)  
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          1
          
                  assert (eo2.langue == "fr")
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
          
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          1
          
                  assert (eo.sigles == eo2.sigles) 
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          1
          
                  assert (eo2.sigles == "s5")
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
          
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          1
          
                  assert (eo.dptCharge == eo2.dptCharge) 
        
      71.

      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
          
        
      73.

          1
          
                  assert (eo.contenu == eo2.contenu)

      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                 
        
      76.

      78.

              def compare(e1, e2)
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
          
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
                  # Ne compare pas les sigles car ils ne peuvent jamais tre les mmes si il n'y en a qu'un
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          5
          
                  assert (e1.creditsMax == e2.creditsMax) 
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          5
          
                  assert (e1.creditsMin == e2.creditsMin)

    95. 
          5

      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          5

      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          5
          
                  assert (e1.dptCharge == e2.dptCharge)
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          5
          
                  assert (e1.contenu == e2.contenu) 
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          5
          
                  assert (e1.commentaire == e2.commentaire) 
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          5

      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          5
          
                  assert (e1.import_commentaire == e2.import_commentaire) 
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          5
          
                  assert (e1.status == e2.status) 
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
                  
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
              end

          1
          
              test "extract_params" do
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
          
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          1
          
                  params = {}
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          1
          
                  params[:creditsMax] = 6
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          1
          
                  params[:creditsMin] = 6
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          1
          
                  params[:intitule] = "intitule"
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          1
          
                  params[:langue] = "fr"
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          1
          
                  params[:sigles] = ["s"]
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          1
          
                  params[:dptCharge] = "INGI"
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          1
          
                  params[:contenu] = [['s1', 1, true],['s2', 2, false]]
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          1
          
                  params[:commentaire] = "commentaire"
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          1
          
                  params[:validite] = 2012
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          1
          
                  params[:import_commentaire] = "import commentaire"
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          1
          
                  params[:status] = "actuel" 
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
          
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          1
          
                  eo = EnsembleObject.new(params)
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
          
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          1
          
                  ep = eo.extract_params()
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
          
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:creditsMax] == params[:creditsMax]
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:creditsMin] == params[:creditsMin]
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:intitule] == params[:intitule]
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:langue] == params[:langue]
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:sigles] == params[:sigles]
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:mtype] == "ensemble"
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:dptCharge] == params[:dptCharge]
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:contenu] == params[:contenu]
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:commentaire] == params[:commentaire]
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:validite] == params[:validite]
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:import_commentaire] == params[:import_commentaire]
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          1
          
                  assert ep[:status] == params[:status]
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
          
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
              end
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
          
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          1
          
              test "get_content_array" do 
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
                  
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          1
          
                  eo = default_ensemble("eo")
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          1
          
                  eo.contenu = "a 1 true, b 2 false, c 3 true"
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
          
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          1
          
                  assert eo.get_content_array == [["a", "1", true], ["b", "2", false], ["c", "3", true]]
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
          
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
              end
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
          
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          1
          
              test "set_content_array" do 
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
          
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          1
          
                  eo = default_ensemble("eo")
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          1
          
                  eo.set_content_array ([["a", "1", true], ["b", "2", false], ["c", "3", true]])
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
          
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          1
          
                  assert  eo.contenu == "a 1 true, b 2 false, c 3 true"
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
          
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
              end
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
          
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          1
          
              test "update_params" do
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
          
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          1
          
                  params = {}
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          1
          
                  params[:creditsMax] = 0
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          1
          
                  params[:creditsMin] = 0
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          1
          
                  params[:intitule] = ""
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          1
          
                  params[:langue] = ""
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          1
          
                  params[:sigles] = ""
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          1
          
                  params[:dptCharge] = ""
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          1
          
                  params[:contenu] = ""
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          1
          
                  params[:commentaire] = ""
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          1
          
                  params[:validite] = 0
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          1
          
                  params[:import_commentaire] = ""
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          1
          
                  params[:status] = "" 
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
          
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          1
          
                  c = CoursObject.new(params)
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
          
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          1
          
                  params = {}
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          1
          
                  params[:creditsMax] = 6
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          1
          
                  params[:creditsMin] = 6
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          1
          
                  params[:intitule] = "intitule"
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          1
          
                  params[:langue] = "fr"
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          1
          
                  params[:sigles] = ["s4"]
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          1
          
                  params[:dptCharge] = "INGI"
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          1
          
                  params[:contenu] = "s1 1 true"
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          1
          
                  params[:commentaire] = "commentaire"
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          1
          
                  params[:validite] = 2012
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          1
          
                  params[:import_commentaire] = "import commentaire"
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          1
          
                  params[:status] = "actuel" 
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
          
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          1
          
                  c.update_params(params)
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
          
        
      190.

                  c.extract_params == params
