      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
          
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          1
          
              test "compaire" do 
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
          
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          1
          
                  params = {}
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          1
          
                  params[:creditsMax] = 6
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          1
          
                  params[:creditsMin] = 6
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          1
          
                  params[:intitule] = "intitule"
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          1
          
                  params[:langue] = "fr"
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          1
          
                  params[:sigles] = ["s4"]
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          1
          
                  params[:dptCharge] = "INGI"
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          1
          
                  params[:contenu] = "s1 1 true"
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          1
          
                  params[:commentaire] = "commentaire"
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          1
          
                  params[:validite] = 2012
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          1
          
                  params[:import_commentaire] = "import commentaire"
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          1
          
                  params[:status] = "actuel"
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          1
          
                  params[:mtype] = "ensemble"
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
          
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          1
          
                  eo = EnsembleObject.new(params)
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
          
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          1
          
                  assert eo.compaire(params) == nil
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
          
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          1
          
                  params[:creditsMax] = 0
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          1
          
                  assert eo.compaire(params).size == 1
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
          
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          1
          
                  params[:creditsMin] = 0
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          1
          
                  assert eo.compaire(params).size == 2
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          
          
          
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          1
          
                  params[:intitule] = ""
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          1
          
                  assert eo.compaire(params).size == 3
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          
          
                  
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          1
          
                  params[:langue] = ""
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          1
          
                  assert eo.compaire(params).size == 4
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          
          
                  
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          1
          
                  params[:sigles] = ""
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          1
          
                  assert eo.compaire(params).size == 5
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          
          
                  
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          1
          
                  params[:dptCharge] = ""
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          1
          
                  assert eo.compaire(params).size == 6
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          
          
                  
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          1
          
                  params[:contenu] = ""
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          1
          
                  assert eo.compaire(params).size == 7
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          
          
                  
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          1
          
                  params[:commentaire] = ""
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          1
          
                  assert eo.compaire(params).size == 8
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          
          
                  
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          1
          
                  params[:validite] = 0
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          1
          
                  assert eo.compaire(params).size == 9
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          
          
                  
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          1
          
                  params[:import_commentaire] = ""
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          1
          
                  assert eo.compaire(params).size == 10
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          
          
                  
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          
          
                  # Le status n'est pas compar
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          1
          
                  params[:status] = ""
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          1
          
                  assert eo.compaire(params).size == 10
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          
          
          
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          1
          
                  params[:mtype] = ""
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          1
          
                  assert eo.compaire(params).size == 11
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          
          
          
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          
          
              end
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          
          
          
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          1
          
              test "update ensemble" do
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          
          
          
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          1
          
                  c_params = {}
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          1
          
                  c_params[:creditsMax] = 6
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          1
          
                  c_params[:sigles] = ["s1","s2","s3"] 
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          1
          
                  c_params[:dureeCours] = 27.75
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          1
          
                  c_params[:dureeTP] = 30
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          
          
          
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          1
          
                  co = CoursObject.new(c_params)
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          1
          
                  c_id = co.save
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          1
          
                  assert(c_id>0)
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          
          
          
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          1
          
                  params = {}
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          1
          
                  params[:creditsMax] = 6
        
      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          1
          
                  params[:creditsMin] = 6
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          1
          
                  params[:intitule] = "intitule"
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          1
          
                  params[:langue] = "fr"
        
      270. 
      
        
    270. 
          1
          
                  params[:sigles] = ["s4"]
        
      271. 
      
        
    271. 
          1
          
                  params[:dptCharge] = "INGI"
        
      272. 
      
        
    272. 
          1
          
                  params[:contenu] = "s1 1 true"
        
      273. 
      
        
    273. 
          1
          
                  params[:commentaire] = "commentaire"
        
      274. 
      
        
    274. 
          1
          
                  params[:validite] = 2012
        
      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          1
          
                  params[:import_commentaire] = "import commentaire"
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          1
          
                  params[:status] = "actuel"
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          
          
          
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          1
          
                  params2 = {}
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          1
          
                  params2[:creditsMax] = 6
        
      280. 
      
        
    280. 
          1
          
                  params2[:creditsMin] = 0
        
      281. 
      
        
    281. 
          1
          
                  params2[:intitule] = "intitule2"
        
      282. 
      
        
    282. 
          1
          
                  params2[:langue] = "angl"
        
      283. 
      
        
    283. 
          1
          
                  params2[:sigles] = ["s5"] 
        
      284. 
      
        
    284. 
          1
          
                  params2[:dptCharge] = "INGI2"
        
      285. 
      
        
    285. 
          1
          
                  params2[:contenu] = "s1 2-3 false"
        
      286. 
      
        
    286. 
          1
          
                  params2[:commentaire] = "commentaire2"
        
      287. 
      
        
    287. 
          1
          
                  params2[:validite] = 2013
        
      288. 
      
        
    288. 
          1
          
                  params2[:import_commentaire] = "import commentaire2"
        
      289. 
      
        
    289. 
          1
          
                  params2[:status] = "archive"
        
      290. 
      
        
    290. 
          
          
          
        
      291. 
      
        
    291. 
          1
          
                  eo1 = EnsembleObject.new(params)
        
      292. 
      
        
    292. 
          1
          
                  id1 = eo1.save
        
      293. 
      
        
    293. 
          1
          
                  assert id1>=0
        
      294. 
      
        
    294. 
          
          
          
        
      295. 
      
        
    295. 
          1
          
                  eo2 = EnsembleObject.new(params2)
        
      296. 
      
        
    296. 
          1
          
                  id2 = eo2.save
        
      297. 
      
        
    297. 
          1
          
                  assert id2>=0
        
      298. 
      
        
    298. 
          
          
          
        
      299. 
      
        
    299. 
          1
          
                  new_oe1 = EnsembleObject.new
        
      300. 
      
        
    300. 
          1
          
                  assert new_oe1.load(id1) == true
        
      301. 
      
        
    301. 
          
          
          
        
      302. 
      
        
    302. 
          1
          
                  params2[:sigles] = ["s14"]       # Autrement, impossible de mettre  jour car s4 et s5 sont dj utiliss
        
      303. 
      
        
    303. 
          
          
          
        
      304. 
      
        
    304. 
          1
          
                  assert new_oe1.update(params2)
        
      305. 
      
        
    305. 
          
          
          
        
      306. 
      
        
    306. 
          1
          
                  new_oe2 = EnsembleObject.new
        
      307. 
      
        
    307. 
          1
          
                  assert new_oe2.load(id2) == true
        
      308. 
      
        
    308. 
          
          
          
        
      309. 
      
        
    309. 
          1
          
                  compare new_oe1,new_oe2
        
      310. 
      
        
    310. 
          
          
              end
        
      311. 
      
        
    311. 
          
          
          
        
      312. 
      
        
    312. 
          1
          
              test "destroy ensemble" do
        
      313. 
      
        
    313. 
          
          
          
        
      314. 
      
        
    314. 
          1
          
                  c_param = {}
        
      315. 
      
        
    315. 
          1
          
                  c_param[:creditsMax] = 6
        
      316. 
      
        
    316. 
          1
          
                  c_param[:sigles] = ["s1","s2","s3"] 
        
      317. 
      
        
    317. 
          1
          
                  c_param[:dureeCours] = 27.75
        
      318. 
      
        
    318. 
          1
          
                  c_param[:dureeTP] = 30
        
      319. 
      
        
    319. 
          
          
          
        
      320. 
      
        
    320. 
          1
          
                  co = CoursObject.new(c_param)
        
      321. 
      
        
    321. 
          1
          
                  c_id = co.save
        
      322. 
      
        
    322. 
          1
          
                  assert c_id>0
        
      323. 
      
        
    323. 
          
          
          
        
      324. 
      
        
    324. 
          1
          
                  param = {}
        
      325. 
      
        
    325. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMax] = 6
        
      326. 
      
        
    326. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMin] = 0
        
      327. 
      
        
    327. 
          1
          
                  param[:sigles] = ["s4"] 
        
      328. 
      
        
    328. 
          1
          
                  param[:dptCharge] = "INGI"
        
      329. 
      
        
    329. 
          1
          
                  param[:contenu] = "s1 1 false"
        
      330. 
      
        
    330. 
          
          
          
        
      331. 
      
        
    331. 
          
          
          
        
      332. 
      
        
    332. 
          1
          
                  pml = Pmodule.all.length
        
      333. 
      
        
    333. 
          1
          
                  ecl = EnsembleContenu.all.length
        
      334. 
      
        
    334. 
          
          
          
        
      335. 
      
        
    335. 
          1
          
                  eo = EnsembleObject.new(param)
        
      336. 
      
        
    336. 
          
          
          
        
      337. 
      
        
    337. 
          1
          
                  assert !eo.persisted?
        
      338. 
      
        
    338. 
          1
          
                  assert eo.save>=0
        
      339. 
      
        
    339. 
          1
          
                  assert eo.persisted?
        
      340. 
      
        
    340. 
          1
          
                  assert eo.destroy
        
      341. 
      
        
    341. 
          1
          
                  assert !eo.persisted?
        
      342. 
      
        
    342. 
          
          
          
        
      343. 
      
        
    343. 
          1
          
                  assert Pmodule.all.length == pml
        
      344. 
      
        
    344. 
          1
          
                  assert EnsembleContenu.all.length == ecl
        
      345. 
      
        
    345. 
          
          
          
        
      346. 
      
        
    346. 
          
          
              end
        
      347. 
      
        
    347. 
          
          
          
        
      348. 
      
        
    348. 
          1
          
              def check_not_persisted(param)
        
      349. 
      
        
    349. 
          
          
          
        
      350. 
      
        
    350. 
          5
          
                  pml = Pmodule.all.length
        
      351. 
      
        
    351. 
          5
          
                  ecl = EnsembleContenu.all.length
        
      352. 
      
        
    352. 
          
          
          
        
      353. 
      
        
    353. 
          5
          
                  ec = EnsembleObject.new(param)
        
      354. 
      
        
    354. 
          5
          
                  id = ec.save()
        
      355. 
      
        
    355. 
          
          
          
        
      356. 
      
        
    356. 
          5
          
                  assert (id<0)
        
      357. 
      
        
    357. 
          
          
          
        
      358. 
      
        
    358. 
          5
          
                  assert Pmodule.all.length == pml
        
      359. 
      
        
    359. 
          5
          
                  assert EnsembleContenu.all.length == ecl
        
      360. 
      
        
    360. 
          
          
          
        
      361. 
      
        
    361. 
          
          
              end
        
      362. 
      
        
    362. 
          
          
          
        
      363. 
      
        
    363. 
          1
          
              test "transactions on save ensemble" do
        
      364. 
      
        
    364. 
          
          
          
        
      365. 
      
        
    365. 
          1
          
                  param = {}
        
      366. 
      
        
    366. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMax] = 6
        
      367. 
      
        
    367. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMin] = 0
        
      368. 
      
        
    368. 
          1
          
                  param[:sigles] = ["s1","s2","s3"] 
        
      369. 
      
        
    369. 
          1
          
                  param[:dptCharge] = "INGI"
        
      370. 
      
        
    370. 
          1
          
                  param[:contenu] = "abc" # <= invalide
        
      371. 
      
        
    371. 
          1
          
                  param[:commentaire] = "commentaire"
        
      372. 
      
        
    372. 
          
          
          
        
      373. 
      
        
    373. 
          1
          
                  check_not_persisted(param)
        
      374. 
      
        
    374. 
          
          
          
        
      375. 
      
        
    375. 
          1
          
                  param[:contenu] = "42 1" # <= invalide
        
      376. 
      
        
    376. 
          
          
          
        
      377. 
      
        
    377. 
          1
          
                  check_not_persisted(param)
        
      378. 
      
        
    378. 
          
          
          
        
      379. 
      
        
    379. 
          1
          
                  c_param = {}
        
      380. 
      
        
    380. 
          1
          
                  c_param[:creditsMax] = 6
        
      381. 
      
        
    381. 
          1
          
                  c_param[:sigles] = ["s4"] 
        
      382. 
      
        
    382. 
          1
          
                  c_param[:dureeCours] = 27.75
        
      383. 
      
        
    383. 
          1
          
                  c_param[:dureeTP] = 30
        
      384. 
      
        
    384. 
          
          
          
        
      385. 
      
        
    385. 
          1
          
                  co = CoursObject.new(c_param)
        
      386. 
      
        
    386. 
          1
          
                  c_id = co.save
        
      387. 
      
        
    387. 
          
          
          
        
      388. 
      
        
    388. 
          1
          
                  param[:contenu] = "s4 a false" # <= invalide
        
      389. 
      
        
    389. 
          
          
          
        
      390. 
      
        
    390. 
          1
          
                  check_not_persisted(param)
        
      391. 
      
        
    391. 
          
          
          
        
      392. 
      
        
    392. 
          1
          
                  param[:contenu] = "s4 12" # <= invalide
        
      393. 
      
        
    393. 
          
          
          
        
      394. 
      
        
    394. 
          1
          
                  check_not_persisted(param)
        
      395. 
      
        
    395. 
          
          
          
        
      396. 
      
        
    396. 
          1
          
                  param[:contenu] = "s4 1-2" # <= invalide
        
      397. 
      
        
    397. 
          
          
          
        
      398. 
      
        
    398. 
          1
          
                  check_not_persisted(param)
        
      399. 
      
        
    399. 
          
          
          
        
      400. 
      
        
    400. 
          1
          
                  param[:contenu] = "s4 1-2 false"
        
      401. 
      
        
    401. 
          
          
          
        
      402. 
      
        
    402. 
          1
          
                  eo1 = EnsembleObject.new(param)
        
      403. 
      
        
    403. 
          1
          
                  id1 = eo1.save
        
      404. 
      
        
    404. 
          1
          
                  assert (id1>=0)
        
      405. 
      
        
    405. 
          
          
          
        
      406. 
      
        
    406. 
          
          
              end
        
      407. 
      
        
    407. 
          
          
          
        
      408. 
      
        
    408. 
          1
          
              def check_not_changed(id, new_param)
        
      409. 
      
        
    409. 
          4
          
                  eo = EnsembleObject.new()
        
      410. 
      
        
    410. 
          4
          
                  assert eo.load(id)
        
      411. 
      
        
    411. 
          
          
          
        
      412. 
      
        
    412. 
          4
          
                  eo2 = EnsembleObject.new()
        
      413. 
      
        
    413. 
          4
          
                  assert (eo2.load(id))
        
      414. 
      
        
    414. 
          
          
          
        
      415. 
      
        
    415. 
          4
          
                  r = eo2.update(new_param)
        
      416. 
      
        
    416. 
          
          
          
        
      417. 
      
        
    417. 
          4
          
                  assert (r==false)
        
      418. 
      
        
    418. 
          
          
          
        
      419. 
      
        
    419. 
          4
          
                  eo2 = EnsembleObject.new()
        
      420. 
      
        
    420. 
          4
          
                  assert (eo2.load(id)) 
        
      421. 
      
        
    421. 
          4
          
                  compare(eo,eo2)
        
      422. 
      
        
    422. 
          
          
              end
        
      423. 
      
        
    423. 
          
          
          
        
      424. 
      
        
    424. 
          1
          
              test "transactions on update ensemble" do
        
      425. 
      
        
    425. 
          
          
          
        
      426. 
      
        
    426. 
          1
          
                  c_param = {}
        
      427. 
      
        
    427. 
          1
          
                  c_param[:creditsMax] = 6
        
      428. 
      
        
    428. 
          1
          
                  c_param[:sigles] = ["s1","s2","s3"] 
        
      429. 
      
        
    429. 
          1
          
                  c_param[:dureeCours] = 27.75
        
      430. 
      
        
    430. 
          1
          
                  c_param[:dureeTP] = 30
        
      431.

          1

      433.

          1
          
                  c_id = co.save
        
      434. 
      
        
    434. 
          1
          
                  assert(c_id>0)
        
      435. 
      
        
    435. 
          
          
          
        
      436. 
      
        
    436. 
          1
          
                  param = {}

          1

      446. 
      
        
    446. 
          
          
          
        
      447. 
      
        
    447. 
          1
          
                  param2 = {}
        
      448. 
      
        
    448. 
          1
          
                  param2[:creditsMax] = 6

    449. 
          1
          
                  param2[:creditsMin] = 0

          1

          1

          1
          
                  param2[:sigles] = ["s5"]

    453. 
          1
          
                  param2[:dptCharge] = "INGI"

    454. 
          1

      455. 
      
        
    455. 
          
          
          
        
      456.

          1
          
                  check_not_changed(id, param2)

          1
          
                  check_not_changed(id, param2)

    462. 
          1

          1

    467. 
          
          
          
        
      468. 
      
        
    468. 
          1
          
                  check_not_changed(id, param2)
        
      469. 
      
        
    469. 
          
          
          
        
      470. 
      
        
    470. 
          
          
              end

              test "remove on contained cours" do
        
      549. 
      
        
    549. 
          
          
          
        
      550. 
      
        
    550. 
          1
          
                  c_param = {}
        
      551. 
      
        
    551. 
          1
          
                  c_param[:creditsMax] = 6
        
      552. 
      
        
    552. 
          1
          
                  c_param[:sigles] = ["s1","s2","s3"]
        
      553. 
      
        
    553. 
          1
          
                  c_param[:dureeCours] = 27.75
        
      554. 
      
        
    554. 
          1
          
                  c_param[:dureeTP] = 30
        
      555. 
      
        
    555. 
          1
          
                  co = CoursObject.new(c_param)
        
      556. 
      
        
    556. 
          1
          
                  c_id = co.save
        
      557. 
      
        
    557. 
          1
          
                  assert(c_id>0)
        
      558. 
      
        
    558. 
          
          
          
        
      559. 
      
        
    559. 
          1
          
                  contenu =  "s1 1 false"
        
      560. 
      
        
    560. 
          
          
          
        
      561. 
      
        
    561. 
          1
          
                  param = {}
        
      562. 
      
        
    562. 
          1

      563. 
      
        
    563. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMin] = 0
        
      564. 
      
        
    564. 
          1
          
                  param[:sigles] = ["s5"] 
        
      565. 
      
        
    565. 
          1
          
                  param[:dptCharge] = "INGI"
        
      566. 
      
        
    566. 
          1
          
                  param[:contenu] = contenu
        
      567. 
      
        
    567. 
          
          
          
        
      568. 
      
        
    568. 
          1

      569.

          1

          1

      571.

      572.

          1

      573.

      574.

          1

      575. 
      
        
    575. 
          
          
          
        
      576.

              end

               test "destroy ensemble but contrainte" do
        
      579. 
      
        
    579. 
          
          
          
        
      580. 
      
        
    580. 
          1
          
                  param = {}
        
      581. 
      
        
    581. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMax] = 5
        
      582. 
      
        
    582. 
          1
          
                  param[:creditsMin] = 0
        
      583. 
      
        
    583. 
          1
          
                  param[:sigles] = ["s1", "s2"] 
        
      584. 
      
        
    584. 
          1
          
                  param[:dptCharge] = "INGI"
        
      585. 
      
        
    585. 
          1
          
                  param[:contenu] = nil
        
      586. 
      
        
    586. 
          
          
          
        
      587. 
      
        
    587. 
          
          
             
        
      588. 
      
        
    588. 
          1
          
                  param2 = {}
        
      589. 
      
        
    589. 
          1
          
                  param2[:creditsMax] = 5
        
      590. 
      
        
    590. 
          1
          
                  param2[:creditsMin] = 0
        
      591. 
      
        
    591. 
          1
          
                  param2[:sigles] = ["s3"] 
        
      592. 
      
        
    592. 
          1
          
                  param2[:dptCharge] = "INGI"
        
      593. 
      
        
    593. 
          1
          
                  param2[:contenu] = nil
        
      594. 
      
        
    594. 
          
          
          
        
      595. 
      
        
    595. 
          1
          
                  e = EnsembleObject.new(param)      # sauve e
        
      596. 
      
        
    596. 
          1
          
                  assert (e.save>=0)
        
      597. 
      
        
    597. 
          1
          
                  e2 = EnsembleObject.new(param2)    # sauve e2
        
      598. 
      
        
    598. 
          1
          
                  assert (e2.save>=0)
        
      599. 
      
        
    599. 
          
          
          
        
      600. 
      
        
    600. 
          1
          
                  assert (e.destroy)
        
      601. 
      
        
    601. 
          1
          
                  assert (e.save>=0)
        
      602. 
      
        
    602. 
          
          
          
        
      603. 
      
        
    603. 
          1
          
                  param = {}
        
      604. 
      
        
    604. 
          1
          
                  param[:target] = "*"
        
      605. 
      
        
    605. 
          1
          
                  param[:cond] = "s1"
        
      606. 
      
        
    606. 
          1
          
                  param[:effet] = "s3"
        
      607. 
      
        
    607. 
          1
          
                  id = ContrainteObject.new(param).save # contrainte interdisant la suppression de e et test de suppression de e
        
      608. 
      
        
    608. 
          1
          
                  assert (!e.destroy)
        
      609. 
      
        
    609. 
          1
          
                  co = ContrainteObject.new()
        
      610. 
      
        
    610. 
          1
          
                  co.load(id)
        
      611. 
      
        
    611. 
          1
          
                  co.destroy                            # suppression de la contrainte et test de suppression de e
        
      612. 
      
        
    612. 
          1
          
                  assert (e.destroy)
        
      613. 
      
        
    613. 
          
          
          
        
      614. 
      
        
    614. 
          1
          
                  assert (e.save>=0)                    # resauvegarde de e 
        
      615. 
      
        
    615. 
          
          
          
        
      616. 
      
        
    616. 
          1
          
                  param = {}
        
      617. 
      
        
    617. 
          1
          
                  param[:target] = "*"
        
      618. 
      
        
    618. 
          1
          
                  param[:cond] = "s3"
        
      619. 
      
        
    619. 
          1
          
                  param[:effet] = "s2"
        
      620. 
      
        
    620. 
          1
          
                  id = ContrainteObject.new(param).save # contrainte interdisant la suppression de e et test de suppression de e
        
      621. 
      
        
    621. 
          1
          
                  assert (!e.destroy)
        
      622. 
      
        
    622. 
          1
          
                  co = ContrainteObject.new()
        
      623. 
      
        
    623. 
          1
          
                  co.load(id)
        
      624. 
      
        
    624. 
          1
          
                  co.destroy                            # suppression de la contrainte et test de suppression de e
        
      625. 
      
        
    625. 
          1
          
                  assert (e.destroy)
        
      626. 
      
        
    626. 
          
          
          
        
      627. 
      
        
    627. 
          
          
             end
        
      628.

    629. 
          1
          
             test "load_all" do
        
      630. 
      
        
    630. 
          
          
          
        
      631. 
      
        
    631. 
          1
          
              eo = default_ensemble("s")
        
      632. 
      
        
    632. 
          1
          
              assert eo.save
        
      633. 
      
        
    633. 
          
          
          
        
      634. 
      
        
    634. 
          1
          
              eo2 = default_ensemble("s2")
        
      635. 
      
        
    635. 
          1
          
              assert eo2.save
        
      636. 
      
        
    636. 
          
          
             
        
      637. 
      
        
    637. 
          1
          
              list = EnsembleObject.load_all()
        
      638. 
      
        
    638. 
          1
          
              assert list.size == 2
        
      639. 
      
        
    639. 
          1
          
              assert list[0].sigles == "s" || list[0].sigles == "s2"
        
      640. 
      
        
    640. 
          1
          
              assert list[1].sigles == "s" || list[1].sigles == "s2"
        
      641. 
      
        
    641. 
          1
          
              assert list[0].sigles != list[1].sigles
        
      642. 
      
        
    642. 
          
          
          
        
      643. 
      
        
    643. 
          
          
             end
        
      644. 
      
        
    644. 
          
          
          
        
      645. 
      
        
    645. 
          
          
          end
        
      646.

    test/unit/objects/pmodule_object_test.rb

    100.0 % covered

    223 relevant lines. 223 lines covered and 0 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          
          
          # encoding: utf-8

    3. 
          1
          
          require 'test_helper'
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
          
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          1
          
          class PmoduleObjectTest < ActiveSupport::TestCase
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
          
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          1
          
              def add_constr_and_check(sigle, mod, value)
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
          
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          7
          
                  param = {}
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          7
          
                  param[:target] = "*"
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          7
          
                  param[:cond] = sigle
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          7
          
                  param[:effet] = sigle
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          7
          
                  c = ContrainteObject.new(param)
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          7
          
                  assert c.save
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
          
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          7
          
                  report = Report.new()
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
          
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          7
          
                  assert mod.can_destroy_recursively?(report) == value
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          7
          
                  assert report.empty? == value
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                  
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          7
          
                  assert c.destroy
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                  
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
              end
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
              test "can_destroy_recursively" do
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
          
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1
          
                  report = Report.new()                           # Ajout d'un ensemble et vrification qu'il est supprimable
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
                  e1 = default_ensemble("e1")
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1
          
                  assert e1.save()
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1
          
                  assert e1.can_destroy_recursively?(report)
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
                  assert report.empty?
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
          
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
                  c1 = default_cours("c1")                        # Ajout d'un cours et vrification qu'il est supprimable
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          1
          
                  assert c1.save()
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          1
          
                  assert c1.can_destroy_recursively?(report)
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          1
          
                  assert report.empty?
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
          
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          1
          
                  e2 = default_ensemble("e2")                     # Ajout d'un ensemble contenant les deux modules, et vrification qu'il est supprimable
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          1
          
                  e2.contenu = "c1 1 true, e1 1-2 false"
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          1
          
                  assert e2.save()
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          1
          
                  assert e2.can_destroy_recursively?(report)
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          1
          
                  assert report.empty?
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
          
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          1
          
                  assert !c1.can_destroy_recursively?(report)     # Verification que le contenu n'est plus supprimable
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          1
          
                  assert !report.empty?
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          1
          
                  report.erase()
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
          
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          1
          
                  assert !e1.can_destroy_recursively?(report)
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          1
          
                  assert !report.empty?
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          1
          
                  report.erase()
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
          
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                  # Cas complet
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
          
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          1
          
                  e1 = default_ensemble("s1")
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          1
          
                  e2 = default_ensemble("s2")
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          1
          
                  c3 = default_cours("s3")
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          1
          
                  c4 = default_cours("s4")
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          1
          
                  e5 = default_ensemble("s5")
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          1
          
                  c6 = default_cours("s6")
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          1
          
                  c7 = default_cours("s7")
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
          
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          1
          
                  e1.contenu = "s2 1 false, s3 1-2 false"
        
      63.

          1

          1
          
              test "destroy_recursively" do
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
          
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          1
          
                  report = Report.new()                           # Ajout d'un ensemble et suppression
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          1
          
                  e1 = default_ensemble("e1")
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          1
          
                  assert e1.save()
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          1
          
                  assert e1.destroy_recursively(report)
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          1
          
                  assert report.empty?
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
          
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          1
          
                  c1 = default_cours("c1")                        # Ajout d'un cours et suppression
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          1
          
                  assert c1.save()
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          1
          
                  assert c1.destroy_recursively(report)
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          1
          
                  assert report.empty?
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
          
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          1
          
                  count = Pmodule.all.length()
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
          
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          1
          
                  e1.save()
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          1
          
                  c1.save()
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
          
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          1
          
                  e2 = default_ensemble("e2")                     # Ajout d'un ensemble contenant deux modules
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          1
          
                  e2.contenu = "c1 1 true, e1 1-2 false"
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          1
          
                  assert e2.save()     
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
          
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          1
          
                  assert !c1.destroy_recursively(report)          # Verification que le contenu n'est plus supprimable
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          1
          
                  assert !report.empty?
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          1
          
                  report.erase()
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
          
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          1
          
                  assert !e1.destroy_recursively(report)       
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          1
          
                  assert !report.empty?
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          1
          
                  report.erase()
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
          
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          1
          
                  assert e2.destroy_recursively(report)           # Suppression du conteneur
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          1
          
                  assert report.empty?
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
          
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          1
          
                  assert Pmodule.all.length() == count            # Vrification que tout a bien t supprim
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
          
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
                  # Cas complet
        
      140.

          1
          
              test "can_destroy_recursively and contraintes" do
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
           
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          1
          
                  report = Report.new()                           # Ajout d'un ensemble et vrification qu'il est supprimable
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          1
          
                  e1 = default_ensemble("e1")
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          1
          
                  assert e1.save()
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          1
          
                  assert e1.can_destroy_recursively?(report)
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          1
          
                  assert report.empty?
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
          
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          1
          
                  c1 = default_cours("c1")                        # Ajout d'un cours et vrification qu'il est supprimable
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          1
          
                  assert c1.save()
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          1
          
                  assert c1.can_destroy_recursively?(report)
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          1
          
                  assert report.empty?
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
          
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          1
          
                  param = {}
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          1
          
                  param[:target] = "*"
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          1
          
                  param[:cond] = "e1"
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          1
          
                  param[:effet] = "c1"
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          1
          
                  c = ContrainteObject.new(param)
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          1
          
                  assert c.save
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
          
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          1
          
                  assert !e1.can_destroy_recursively?(report)
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          1
          
                  assert !report.empty?
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          1
          
                  report.erase()
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
          
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          1
          
                  assert !c1.can_destroy_recursively?(report)
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          1
          
                  assert !report.empty?
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          1
          
                  report.erase()
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          
          
          
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          1
          
                  assert c.destroy()
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          
          
          
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          1
          
                  assert e1.can_destroy_recursively?(report)
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          1
          
                  assert report.empty?
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          
          
          
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          1
          
                  assert c1.can_destroy_recursively?(report)
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          1
          
                  assert report.empty?
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          
          
          
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          1
          
                  param = {}
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          1
          
                  param[:target] = "e1"
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          1
          
                  param[:cond] = "c1"
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          1
          
                  param[:effet] = "c1"
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          1
          
                  c = ContrainteObject.new(param)
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          1
          
                  assert c.save
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          
          
          
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          1
          
                  assert !c1.can_destroy_recursively?(report)
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          1
          
                  assert !report.empty?
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          1
          
                  report.erase()
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          
          
          
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          1
          
                  assert !e1.can_destroy_recursively?(report)
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          1
          
                  assert !report.empty?
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          1
          
                  report.erase()
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          
          
          
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          1
          
                  e2 = default_ensemble("e2")                     # Ajout d'un ensemble contenant les deux modules, et vrification qu'il est supprimable
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          1
          
                  e2.contenu = "c1 1 true, e1 1-2 false"
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          1
          
                  assert e2.save()
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          1
          
                  assert !e2.can_destroy_recursively?(report)
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          1
          
                  assert !report.empty?
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          1
          
                  report.erase()
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          
          
          
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          1
          
                  assert c.destroy
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          
          
          
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          1
          
                  assert e2.can_destroy_recursively?(report)
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          1
          
                  assert report.empty?
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          
          
          
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          
          
                   # Cas complet
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          
          
          
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          1
          
                  e1 = default_ensemble("s1")
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          1
          
                  e2 = default_ensemble("s2")
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          1
          
                  c3 = default_cours("s3")
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          1
          
                  c4 = default_cours("s4")
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          1
          
                  e5 = default_ensemble("s5")
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          1
          
                  c6 = default_cours("s6")
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          1
          
                  c7 = default_cours("s7")
        
      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          
          
          
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          1
          
                  e1.contenu = "s2 1 false, s3 1-2 false"
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          1
          
                  e2.contenu = "s4 1 false, s5 1-2 false"
        
      270. 
      
        
    270. 
          1
          
                  e5.contenu = "s6 1 false, s7 1-2 false"
        
      271. 
      
        
    271. 
          
          
          
        
      272. 
      
        
    272. 
          1
          
                  assert c7.save > 0
        
      273. 
      
        
    273. 
          1
          
                  assert c6.save > 0
        
      274. 
      
        
    274. 
          1
          
                  assert e5.save > 0
        
      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          1
          
                  assert c4.save > 0
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          1
          
                  assert c3.save > 0
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          1
          
                  assert e2.save > 0
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          1
          
                  assert e1.save > 0
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          
          
          
        
      280. 
      
        
    280. 
          1
          
                  assert e1.can_destroy_recursively?(report)
        
      281. 
      
        
    281. 
          1
          
                  assert report.empty?
        
      282. 
      
        
    282. 
          
          
          
        
      283. 
      
        
    283. 
          1
          
                  add_constr_and_check("s1", e1, false)
        
      284. 
      
        
    284. 
          1
          
                  add_constr_and_check("s1", e2, false)
        
      285. 
      
        
    285. 
          1
          
                  add_constr_and_check("s1", c3, false)
        
      286. 
      
        
    286. 
          1
          
                  add_constr_and_check("s1", c4, false)
        
      287. 
      
        
    287. 
          1
          
                  add_constr_and_check("s1", e5, false)
        
      288. 
      
        
    288. 
          1
          
                  add_constr_and_check("s1", c6, false)
        
      289. 
      
        
    289. 
          1
          
                  add_constr_and_check("s1", c7, false)
        
      290. 
      
        
    290. 
          
          
                  
        
      291. 
      
        
    291. 
          1
          
                  assert e1.can_destroy_recursively?(report)
        
      292. 
      
        
    292. 
          1
          
                  assert report.empty?
        
      293. 
      
        
    293. 
          
          
          
        
      294. 
      
        
    294. 
          
          
              end
        
      295. 
      
        
    295. 
          
          
          
        
      296. 
      
        
    296. 
          1
          
              test "graphs" do 
        
      297. 
      
        
    297. 
          
          
          
        
      298. 
      
        
    298. 
          1
          
                  c = default_cours("c")            
        
      299. 
      
        
    299. 
          
          
          
        
      300. 
      
        
    300. 
          1
          
                  e = default_ensemble("e")   
        
      301. 
      
        
    301. 
          1
          
                  e.contenu = "c 1 false"
        
      302. 
      
        
    302. 
          
          
          
        
      303. 
      
        
    303. 
          1
          
                  assert c.save > 0
        
      304. 
      
        
    304. 
          1
          
                  assert e.save > 0
        
      305. 
      
        
    305. 
          
          
          
        
      306. 
      
        
    306. 
          1
          
                  assert c.build_graph
        
      307. 
      
        
    307. 
          1
          
                  assert c.build_complete_graph
        
      308. 
      
        
    308. 
          
          
          
        
      309. 
      
        
    309. 
          1
          
                  assert e.build_graph

          1

      116.

          1
          
                  check_create_for(pm.id, "sigle", true)
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          1
          
                  check_create_for(pm.id, "sigle", false)
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          1
          
                  check_create_for(pm.id, "sigle2", true)
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          1
          
                  check_create_for(pm2.id, "sigle", false)
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
          
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
              end
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
          
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
          end
        
      124.

    test/unit/tree/node_test.rb

    100.0 % covered

    19 relevant lines. 19 lines covered and 0 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          1
          
          require 'test_helper'
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
          
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          1
          
          class NodeTest < ActiveSupport::TestCase
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
          
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          1
          
          	test "normal case" do 
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
          
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          1
          
          		n = Node.new("abc")
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          1
          
          		n2 = Node.new("def")
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
          		
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
          		assert n.data = "abc"
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          1
          
          		assert n.children.empty?()
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
          
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
          		# Ajout de noeud
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
          
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          1
          
          		n.add_child(n2)
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          1
          
          		assert n.data == "abc"
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
          
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
          		# Check du contenu
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
          
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          1
          
          		assert !n.children.empty?
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          1
          
          		assert n.children.size == 1
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
          		assert n.children[0].data == "def"
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
          
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          		# Listes
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
          
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
          		assert n.list.sort == ["abc","def"].sort
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
          
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
          		assert n.list_nodes.size == 2
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1
          
          		assert n.list_nodes[0].data == "def"
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1
          
          		assert n.list_nodes[1].data == "abc"
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
          		# Suppression de noeud
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
          
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          1
          
          		assert !n.remove_child(nil)
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          1
          
          		assert n.remove_child(n2)
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
          
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1
          
          		assert n.children.empty?()
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
          
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          	end
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
          
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
          end
        
      42.

          require 'test_helper'

          1
          
          class SelectionNodeTest < ActiveSupport::TestCase
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
          
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          1
          
          	test "normal case" do 
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
          
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          1
          
          		n = SelectionNode.new("abc")
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          1
          
          		n2 = SelectionNode.new("def", true)
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
          
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
          		n.add_child(n2)
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
          
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
          		# Test de slection par dfaut et slection force
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
          
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          1
          
          		assert !n.is_selected?
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          1
          
          		assert n2.is_selected?
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
          
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
          		# Test de liste slectionne
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
          
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          1
          
          		n.list_selected_nodes.size == 1
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          1
          
          		n.list_selected_nodes[0].data == ["def"]
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
          
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
          		# Test de liste slectionne, aprs inversion des slections
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
          
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          1
          
          		n.select
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
          		n2.deselect
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
          
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1
          
          		assert n.is_selected?
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
          		assert !n2.is_selected?
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1
          
          		n.list_selected_nodes.size == 1
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
          		n.list_selected_nodes[0].data == ["abc"]
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
          
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
          		# Test de clone
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          1
          
          		n3 = n.clone()
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
          		
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1
          
          		assert n3.data == "abc"
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          1
          
          		assert n3.is_selected?
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          1
          
          		assert n.is_selected?
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
          
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          1
          
          		n3.deselect
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
          
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1
          
          		assert !n3.is_selected?
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          1
          
          		assert n.is_selected?
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
          
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          1
          
          		n3.select
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          1
          
          		n.deselect
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
          
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          1
          
          		assert n3.is_selected?
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          1
          
          		assert !n.is_selected?
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
          		
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
          	end
        
      53.

    test/unit/tree/selection_tree_test.rb

    100.0 % covered

    30 relevant lines. 30 lines covered and 0 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          1
          
          require 'test_helper'
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
          
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          1
          
          class SelectionTreeTest < ActiveSupport::TestCase
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
          
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          1
          
          	test "build_tree" do
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
          
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          1
          
          		eo1 = default_ensemble("s1")
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          1
          
          		eo2 = default_ensemble("s2")
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          1
          
          		eo3 = default_ensemble("s3")
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
          		eo4 = default_ensemble("s4")
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          1
          
          		eo5 = default_ensemble("s5")
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          1
          
          		eo6 = default_ensemble("s6")
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          1
          
          		eo7 = default_ensemble("s7")
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
          
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          1
          
          		eo1.contenu = "s2 1 true, s3 1 false"
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          1
          
          		eo2.contenu = "s4 1 false, s5 1 true"
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          1
          
          		eo3.contenu = "s6 1 true, s7 1 false"
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
          
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          1
          
          		assert eo7.save() > 0
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          1
          
          		assert eo6.save() > 0
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          1
          
          		assert eo5.save() > 0
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
          		assert eo4.save() > 0
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          1
          
          		assert eo3.save() > 0
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          1
          
          		assert eo2.save() > 0
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
          		assert eo1.save() > 0
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
          
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1
          
          		n1 = SelectionNode.new(eo1)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
          		SelectionTree.build_tree(n1)
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
          		# Vrification que seul le contenu obligatoire, dont tous les anctres sont obligatoires
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          		# est slectionn, ainsi que la racine.
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
          
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
          		assert n1.is_selected?
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          1
          
          		assert Tree.find_node(n1, "s1").is_selected?
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          1
          
          		assert Tree.find_node(n1, "s2").is_selected?
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          1
          
          		assert !Tree.find_node(n1, "s3").is_selected?
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1
          
          		assert !Tree.find_node(n1, "s4").is_selected?
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          1
          
          		assert Tree.find_node(n1, "s5").is_selected?
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          1
          
          		assert !Tree.find_node(n1, "s6").is_selected?
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          1
          
          		assert !Tree.find_node(n1, "s7").is_selected?
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
          
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
          	end
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
          
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
          end
